112b7(khri brgyad): 'das de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de/ de bzhin nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags//
112b8(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
113a1(khri brgyad): spyod pas/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid du chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa dang / yang dag pa'i
113a2(khri brgyad): mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzungs
113a3(khri brgyad): kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid gang
113a4(khri brgyad): lags pa de/ gzungs kyi sgo ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzungs kyi sgo ma mchis ste/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid lcags/ stong pa nyid kyang bzungs kyi sgo lags pa'i
113a5(khri brgyad): slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la
113a6(khri brgyad): gnas par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gas
113a7(khri brgyad): te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du ba la spyod pa lags kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
113a8(khri brgyad): la smod pa ma lagaso// lag te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnams par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags
113b1(khri brgyad): kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi
113b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa
113b3(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan
113b4(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par ltung
113b5(khri brgyad): ba'i yid kyi gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
113b6(khri brgyad): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongasu 'dzin
113b7(khri brgyad): ba ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa
113b8(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
114a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/
114a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa/ thabs mi mkhas pas gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i yid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
114a3(khri brgyad): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa las
114a4(khri brgyad): kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi
114a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
114a6(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongasu bzung ba ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
114a7(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs kyi yongasu pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags
114a8(khri brgyad): blas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas rnam
114a9(khri brgyad): kra zugs ma lags
114a10(khri brgyad): par shes pa pa lags pa'i slad du'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzug
114b1(khri brgyad): rta ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ma lags pa'i slad du'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rang ba'i/
114b2(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa'i slad du'o// yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
114b3(khri brgyad): spyad pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par brtag par bgyi ste/ ji ltar na chos gang la yang yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongasu brtag par bgyi'o/
114b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongasu ma bzung ba de zhes bgyi ba ste/ rgya che ba
114b5(khri brgyad): dang / phul du bgyi ba tshad ma mchis pa/ nges pa mi 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / mthun mongs ma lags te/ ting nge 'dzin
114b6(khri brgyad): gyis dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// rnam pa
114b7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
114b8(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
115a1(khri brgyad): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
115a2(khri brgyad): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so// /
115a3(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan mar brjod pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o// mtshan ma gang lags zhe na/ gzugs ni mtshan ma las
115a4(khri brgyad): so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lag so// mig ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
115a5(khri brgyad): dang / yid ni mtshan ma lag so// gzugs ni mtshan ma lag so/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mtshan ma lagaso// mig gi rnam par shes
115a6(khri brgyad): ba ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
115a7(khri brgyad): pa ni mtshan ma lag so// mig gis 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba'i 'dus te pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg dang / lus kyi 'dus
115a8(khri brgyad): te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lagaso// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
115b1(khri brgyad): kha'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid/
115b2(khri brgyad): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lag so// sa'i khams ni mtshan ma lag so// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams
115b3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma lagaso// ma rig pa ni mtshan ma lags so// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang /
115b4(khri brgyad): reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma lags so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spongs pa dang /
115b5(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
115b6(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par
115b7(khri brgyad): par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lagaso//
115b8(khri brgyad): gcig brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so// gnyis brjod pa ni mtshan ma lagaso// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar bzungs lags so// mngon par shes
116a1(khri brgyad): mtshan ma lags so// bzungs kyi sgo dag/ ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo thams cad ni mtshan ma lags te/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o// gal te shes rab kyi
116a2(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa de mtshan mar bzung bar bgyi ba zhig lags na ni/ kun tu rgyu bzo spangs de bstan pa 'dir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la dad pa thob mi 'gyur lagaso// dad pa ga/
116a3(khri brgyad): zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa dang /
116a4(khri brgyad): de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul yang ma lags so// de ltar na ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang bzung ba ma mchis
116a5(khri brgyad): par bzung bar bgyi lags te/ kun du rgyun bzo spangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba nye tshe ba'i shes pas zhugs te/
116a6(khri brgyad): de zhugs nas gzugs yongasu ma bzung ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu ma bzungs lags so// de ci'i
116a7(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad la/ yongasu 'dzin pa pos ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o// de yang ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar
116a8(khri brgyad): des shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par gzhan du yang dag par rjesu ma mthong / phyi rol du yang dag par rje su ma mthong shes pa de thob pa dang /
116b1(khri brgyad): mngon par rtogs par phyi nang kun du yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags na nang du yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba'i sgra sung//
116b2(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyi ba'i chos de ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su
116b3(khri brgyad): ma mthong ste/ shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par/
116b4(khri brgyad): shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong // shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
116b5(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol du yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes pa
116b6(khri brgyad): de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang dag par rje su ma mthong pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du shes pa de yang dag pa'i
116b7(khri brgyad): mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rje su ma mthong / shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de yang
116b8(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha' las gzhan du yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo spangs mos par gyu te/ de 'dir mos nas dad pas
116b9(khri brgyad): shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang kun du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
117a1(khri brgyad): rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad med bgyis te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par
117a2(khri brgyad): gyur te/ de de ltar mos nas des chos gang mtshan ma mchis par yid la bgyid pa'i slad du/ chos gang yang yongasu bzung ba ma mchis lag so// chos thams cad bzung du ma mchis
117a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / btang du ma mchis pa'i slad du des gang yongasu bzung ba 'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma mchis te/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni mya
117a4(khri brgyad): ngan las 'das pas kyang rloms semasu gyur pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gang gzugs yongasu mi
117a5(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/
117a6(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongasu mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu ma mchis pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag
117a7(khri brgyad): so// de ni smon lam dag yongasu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du/ bar ma dor yongasu mya ngan las mi
117a8(khri brgyad): 'da' lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ smon lam de dag smon lam ma lags/ stobs de dag stobs ma lags/ mi 'jigs de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/ so so//
117b1(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par tha lags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te/
117b2(khri brgyad): de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gang gzugs
117b3(khri brgyad): yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongasu mi 'dzin pa de ni/ gzhan pha rol du phyin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
117b4(khri brgyad): phyin pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po bdun pa// / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
117b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar yongs su brtags par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci'i phyir/ shes rab
117b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig na/ zhes yongasu brtag par bgyi'o// de de ltar yongasu rtog cing de ltar nges par sems dpa'i tshe/ gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dmig
117b7(khri brgyad): pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin lags par yang dag rje su 'thod na/ de lags par mthong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma
117b8(khri brgyad): mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang dag med cing
118a1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
118a2(khri brgyad): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
118a3(khri brgyad): mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa
118a4(khri brgyad): nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshe dang ldan
118a5(khri brgyad): sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmig so// bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
118a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi
118a7(khri brgyad): dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
118a8(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing
118b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
118b2(khri brgyad): bcu rtsa bdun gyi bar du yang med cing mi dmig so// mngon par shes pa med pad+ma mI ga so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang /
118b3(khri brgyad): ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag
118b4(khri brgyad): pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rgyun tu zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dgra bcom pa dang / rang
118b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang med cing mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngar
118b6(khri brgyad): kyi phyir thams cad shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan
118b7(khri brgyad): pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa/ gal te sems mi zhum mi 'gong la mi dngangs zhing dngangs
118b8(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma dral bar rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus
119a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams
119a2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
119a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de yang dag par ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dus
119a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ smin pa'i pha ro tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
119a5(khri brgyad): dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
119a6(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan pa shi ri'i
119a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni/ sangs kyi chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i yang dag pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa
119a8(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ci lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan pa/
119b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor/
119b2(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin
119b3(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
119b4(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du la dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig pa
119b5(khri brgyad): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
119b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang
119b7(khri brgyad): bzhin dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub
119b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
120a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang bslab pa 'di
120a2(khri brgyad): la bslab pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams
120a3(khri brgyad): cad ma skyes zhing 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges 'byung ba med pa yin/
120a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs kyi stong ste/ de la skye ba dang nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
120a5(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de skye ba dang nges par 'byung bar mi dmigs so// de bzhin du yang
120a6(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong ste/ de la skye ba dang / 'byung ba mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
120a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no// de ci lta ci ltar bla na med
120a8(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba de lus yong su dag pa dang / ngag yongasu dag pa dang / sems yong su dag pa dang mtshan yongs su
120a9(khri brgyad): dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltar lus yong su dag pa dang / dag yong su dag pa dang / sems yongasu dga' mtshan ma yongs su ngo/
120b1(khri brgyad): thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'dod chags dang / ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do// zhes dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang /
120b2(khri brgyad): rgyu dang / g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phra dog dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do// de 'dod
120b3(khri brgyad): chags kyi mi bskyed cing / zhes sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyu dang / g.yo dang / phra dog dang / ser sna dang / chags pa dang /
120b4(khri brgyad): lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye bas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing rtag par rgyun du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
120b5(khri brgyad): mched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnam su mi skye'o// de sems can rnams yongasasu smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed cing /
120b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ nam yang sangs
120b7(khri brgyad): ngargyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan
120b8(khri brgyad): yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi btang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
121a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ltar spyod pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar yin no// shes rab kyi pha
121a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// / kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
121a3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sprod pa/ gal te
121a4(khri brgyad): thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
121a5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba
121a6(khri brgyad): dang / mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa
121a7(khri brgyad): lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba dang / mi rtag ces bgyi na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ tshor ba
121a8(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi ba 'am mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
121b1(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa ma lag so// gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
121b2(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/
121b3(khri brgyad): bdag ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi ba dang / bdag ma mchis
121b4(khri brgyad): shes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so// gal te tshor ba dang /
121b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi
121b6(khri brgyad): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi
121b7(khri brgyad): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
121b8(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa// thabs mi mkhas pas gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnam
122a1(khri brgyad): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa rnams kyi nga
122a2(khri brgyad): dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
122a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/ byang chub sems
122a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du/ gang de ltar spyod pa de ni she
122a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no// snyam du sems na mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
122a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lag so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
122a7(khri brgyad): thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
122a8(khri brgyad): pa/ 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gnas shing kun tu shes te mos de gzugs mngon
122b1(khri brgyad): ra 'a byed pa la spyod pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang byed rnapas dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa yin te ni de'i skye ba dang / na ba dang / na ba dang / mching dang /
122b2(khri brgyad): mya ngan dang / skyes sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde bar byed pa dang / 'khrugs pa byed pa yin no zhes kho bo smra'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
122b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mi mkhas pas/ gal te mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
122b4(khri brgyad): yid la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gzugs la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas te kun tu shes te mos/
122b5(khri brgyad): mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par
122b6(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna
122b7(khri brgyad): dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug
122b8(khri brgyad): bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun du shes te mos// gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
122'a1(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing
122'a2(khri brgyad): kun du shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos// mig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin
122'a3(khri brgyad): pa drag dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob
122'a4(khri brgyad): bcu la gnas shing kun du shes te mos// sangs rgyas kyi sa chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang/
122'a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun du shes te mos na mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spong
122'a6(khri brgyad): na/ skye ba dang / rga shi dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las
122'a7(khri brgyad): yongasu mi mthar zhing / sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa las yongasu mi 'grol lo zhes kho bo smra'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos kyis sa 'am/
122'a8(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du bya ba'i bskal ba yang med na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta ga la 'gyur te ngo/
122'b1(khri brgyad): gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o//
122'b2(khri brgyad): sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya/ rab
122'b3(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya/ rab
122'b4(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba
122'b5(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spong / gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
122'b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la mi spong / gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzug
122'b7(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi
122'b8(khri brgyad): zhes pa dang / bzhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag zhes bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya
123a1(khri brgyad): dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / bzhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes
123a2(khri brgyad): bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
123a3(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnams par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon
123a4(khri brgyad): pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / gzugs bden zhes bya bar mi spyong / mi bden zhes bya ba mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
123a5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
123a6(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs
123a7(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs
123a8(khri brgyad): nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
123b1(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam lnga par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ rnam par shes
123b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
123b3(khri brgyad): brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin
123b4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par reg pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong
123b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang
123b6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
123b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
123b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bskal pa yod pa yin//
124a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te chos 'ga' zhig khas len na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khas mi len na
124a2(khri brgyad): yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khas len kyang len la khas mi len kyang mi len na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khas
124a3(khri brgyad): len pa yang ma yin khas mi len pa len pa yang ma yin na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
124a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ci'i phyir khas mi len/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
124a5(khri brgyad): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
124a6(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ sprod do zhes bya bar khas mi len mi
124a7(khri brgyad): spyod zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la myi spyod do zhes khas mi len/ spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar mi len to// de ci'i phyir na
124a8(khri brgyad): na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
124b1(khri brgyad): chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi
124b2(khri brgyad): phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/
124b3(khri brgyad): rgya che ba phul du bya ba tshad med pa nges pa mi 'phrogs pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i
124b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/
124b5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
124b6(khri brgyad): chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// 'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gzhan dag gis gnas
124b7(khri brgyad): pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
124b8(khri brgyad): sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang da/
125a1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i du byang chub sems
125a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
125a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/
125a4(khri brgyad): dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
125a5(khri brgyad): thams cad la shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos
125a6(khri brgyad): kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug
125a7(khri brgyad): nga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
125a8(khri brgyad): dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus
125b1(khri brgyad): kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la don mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
125b2(khri brgyad): tshig bla dgasal 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs lha lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjod
125b3(khri brgyad): ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'du ba rgya mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / namakha' khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor
125b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse me'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po rtog zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rje su song ba
125b5(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par springs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting
125b6(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems
125b7(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i smon ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' lus pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i
125b8(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog
126a1(khri brgyad): gi smon ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid
126a2(khri brgyad): yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
126a3(khri brgyad): dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya
126a4(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu
126a5(khri brgyad): gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
126a6(khri brgyad): dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
126a7(khri brgyad): cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang
126a8(khri brgyad): bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa slong po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi nges par 'jug pa zhes
126b1(khri brgyad): g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
126b2(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
126b3(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshog su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas
126b4(khri brgyad): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i togs rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs
126b5(khri brgyad): pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
126b6(khri brgyad): dang / yongasu spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod
126b7(khri brgyad): bcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par cig du gyur pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'ja
126b8(khri brgyad): rnam par dor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra thams cad la
126b9(khri brgyad): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / skra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongasu
127a1(khri brgyad): sbyongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'azod pa rnyog pa med pa' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa
127a2(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang ba sdug bsngal ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zed mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces
127a3(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal
127a4(khri brgyad): ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang / 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya
127a5(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nye ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / klog gi 'od ces bya ba'i
127a6(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid
127a7(khri brgyad): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa'i rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par
127a8(khri brgyad): 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang /
127b1(khri brgyad): de nyid la gnas bzhin sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gis skyon rnam par 'jig pa
127b2(khri brgyad): nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod do// ting nge 'dzin
127b3(khri brgyad): de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang
127b4(khri brgyad): ldan pa sha ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
127b5(khri brgyad): chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya te/ gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
127b6(khri brgyad): bo rnams du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag
127b7(khri brgyad): kyang yang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu a la la byang chub
127b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
128a1(khri brgyad): @kyang/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing / de ltar phrogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gis kye/
128a2(khri brgyad): ma rnyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
128a3(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis
128a4(khri brgyad): gnas pa des ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / bdag ni snyoms par 'jug/ bdag ni snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar ting 'dzin de rlom
128a5(khri brgyad): sems su 'gyur ba yang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo // sha ri'i bus smras pa/
128a6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i
128a7(khri brgyad): sang rgyas rnam kyi lung bstan du yod dam/ rab 'byor gyi smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ni medo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang
128a8(khri brgyad): gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang bya
128b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub
128b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin
128b3(khri brgyad): na/ ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge
128b4(khri brgyad): 'dzin de dag kun shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kun tu shes pa med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji lta kun tu shes pa med/
128b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog pa mi byed pa ltar ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
128b6(khri brgyad): chos thams cad med pa'i phyir de ltar ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam par rtogs par byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na rigs bu des ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam par
128b7(khri brgyad): mi shes shing kun du mi shes so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cihrIn des rnam par mi shes kun du mi shes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/
128b8(khri brgyad): sha ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par mi shes shing kun du mi shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
129a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog du bstan pa khyod kyi
129a2(khri brgyad): bshad pa ni de yin te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni leg so leg so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
129a3(khri brgyad): la de ltar bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
129a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par bya'o//
129a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la yang de ltar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces
129a6(khri brgyad): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom
129a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab pa yin te/ de
129a8(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin du bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /
129b1(khri brgyad): rgyal khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa langasang// des nga dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slong 'o// rang na du kya chub tu
129b2(khri brgyad): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag la bslabs te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob
129b3(khri brgyad): ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi slob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob
129b4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsar
129b5(khri brgyad): pa/ shi ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// sha ril
129b6(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji zhig mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi
129b7(khri brgyad): dmigs so// shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar dag mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag par phyir phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / brten cing 'brel
129b8(khri brgyad): bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmi
130a1(khri brgyad): gso// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod khams dang / gzugs kyi khams gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phying
130a2(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dag mi dmigs so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag mi dmig so//
130a3(khri brgyad): shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmig so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ongs pa dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang //
130a4(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas mi dmig so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar mi dmigs so// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/
130a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
130a6(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmig su med pa dang / mngon paro 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes
130a7(khri brgyad): bya'o// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la slob pa lags/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
130a8(khri brgyad): sha ri'i bu chos de dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di
130b1(khri brgyad): ngag ni ji lta bu mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir ma rig
130b2(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya'o// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i
130b3(khri brgyad): bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ gzugs yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi phyir//
130b4(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir khams dang skye
130b5(khri brgyad): mched dang / brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
130b6(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
130b7(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag yod pa ma yin na/ de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang / sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen pa dag gis yod pa ma yin partags
130b8(khri brgyad): te yod pa ma yin pa mngon par zhen nas/ 'di lnga ste rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas na de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod/
131a1(khri brgyad): pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags pas ping dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la
131a2(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la yang mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas na/ yod pa ma yin
131a3(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba yin no// ci zhig mi shes mi mthong ba yin zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo //
131a4(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // khams dang / skye mched dang / brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
131a5(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag mi mthong bas de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya
131a6(khri brgyad): ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no// de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas kyang nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhes na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yino// /
131a7(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni pa dad pa yin te ci zhig la ma dad ces na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi stong zhes
131a8(khri brgyad): bya bar ma dad pa nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyi stong ste zhes bya ba'i bar dag pa la dad pa yin no// de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig la mi gnas zhes na/
131b1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
131b2(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
131b3(khri brgyad): kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa yin te de'i phyir byis pa rnams zhes bya'o// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon
131b4(khri brgyad): par zhen pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin no// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
131b5(khri brgyad): la mngon par zhen pa yin no// gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// phung po
131b6(khri brgyad): dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// 'dod chags dang / zhes sdang dang / gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// lta bar
131b7(khri brgyad): gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin no// de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no//
131b8(khri brgyad): sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslob pa ma lags shing rna
132a1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags modo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
132a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// sha ri'i
132a3(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags zhing / ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams
132a4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spros
132a5(khri brgyad): gang gis tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ yang dag par rje su mi mthong na/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she rab kyis/
132a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung // de bzhin du bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsgo
132a7(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ sbyin
132a8(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rje su mi mthong / byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs yang dag par rje su mi mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
132b1(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag mi dmigs yang dag par rjes mi mthong na/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
132b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung // sha
132b3(khri brgyad): ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam pa
132b4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo // // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
132b5(khri brgyad): las mtshan ma'i le'u dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda
132b6(khri brgyad): 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci rgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges
132b7(khri brgyad): bar 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan
132b8(khri brgyad): par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
133a1(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar dag la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
133a2(khri brgyad): thod par 'gyur ram zhes mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de khyod
133a3(khri brgyad): nyid la dris/ khyod ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob zhig/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma ya
133a4(khri brgyad): gzhan la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
133a5(khri brgyad): 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mig kyang gzhan zhig yin/
133a6(khri brgyad): snyam 'am/ rab 'byor sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyab 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la
133a7(khri brgyad): gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan yin snyam 'am/
133a8(khri brgyad): sgyu ma yang gzhan la mi dmigs rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
133b1(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'ag/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la
133b2(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang
133b3(khri brgyad): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
133b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde 'am/
133b5(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
133b6(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba dang /
133b7(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor/
133b8(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la//
134a1(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
134a2(khri brgyad): de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la stong nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma
134a3(khri brgyad): yang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis
134a4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
134a5(khri brgyad): stobs bcu yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis
134a6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams
134a7(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs
134a8(khri brgyad): kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags lags/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs/ tshor
134b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags so// btso/
134b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig lag so// bcom ldan
134b3(khri brgyad): 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/
134b4(khri brgyad): sgyu ma nyid lcags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/
134b5(khri brgyad): sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom
134b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos rnams lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa/
134b7(khri brgyad): yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa lag so// bcom ldan
134b8(khri brgyad): 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
135a1(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid
135a2(khri brgyad): kyang yid kyis rnam par shes pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags la/ mig gis 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan
135a3(khri brgyad): 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma gla zhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus
135a4(khri brgyad): te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
135a5(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lag so// mig gi 'dus
135a6(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba bde ba 'chi/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan
135a7(khri brgyad): 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
135a8(khri brgyad): lags pa/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang mi lags
135b1(khri brgyad): so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i
135b2(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/
135b3(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde pa 'am/ sdug bsngal
135b4(khri brgyad): bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde
135b5(khri brgyad): ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan lags/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu
135b6(khri brgyad): ma yang gzhan ma lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang gzhan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nyid
135b7(khri brgyad): kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ba nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs bcu rtsa bdun lag
135b8(khri brgyad): so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
136a1(khri brgyad): / stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mtshan ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma
136a2(khri brgyad): ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ smon ma mchis pa yang
136a3(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang smon pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma
136a4(khri brgyad): yang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams nyid kyang sgra/
136a5(khri brgyad): ma lags/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sgra ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bco
136a6(khri brgyad): brgyad gyis bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas
136a7(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lag so// bcom ldan 'das smra ma yang gzhan ma lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom
136a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
136b1(khri brgyad): sprul pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
136b2(khri brgyad): 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am 'gag pa snyam 'am/ rab 'byor
136b3(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med
136b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa
136b5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du/ thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
136b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po brgyad pa'o//
136b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyadam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
136b8(khri brgyad): bar ming dang brdas tha skad du gdags su yod dang/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
137a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ ming dang brdas tha skad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po dag gi/ skye ba 'am/ 'ag
137a2(khri brgyad): pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan
137a3(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang ming med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / brda' med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med
137a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi sa las med pa dang / yid med pa dang/
137a5(khri brgyad): yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
137a6(khri brgyad): bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis
137a7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmig
137a8(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyis pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad
137b1(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar/
137b2(khri brgyad): spobs cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nges par 'byung bar 'tshal ba ni skye ba'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
137b3(khri brgyad): byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o/ de ci'i gling zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po gang dag lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du
137b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
137b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lag
137b6(khri brgyad): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan
137b7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa
137b8(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'byung ba lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
138a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lag so// dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmig su ma mchis
138a2(khri brgyad): ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag cha lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag dang / mig gi yor lta bu dang /
138a3(khri brgyad): chu zla lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig sgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing
138a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du blar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
138a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/
138a6(khri brgyad): sgyu ma yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig sgyu yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs
138a7(khri brgyad): brnyan yang dngos pos ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmig su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bco
138a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni/ dbang
138b1(khri brgyad): po drug lags te/ de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/ de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi dmigs su ma mchis shing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi dmig
138b2(khri brgyad): su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang
138b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag ste/ dngangs shing dngangs par mi 'gyur lags grangs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
138b4(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yin la/ thabs yang mi mkhas pa zhig te dge ba'i bshes gnyen
