138b5(khri brgyad): gyi lag du yang ma song na/ skrag cing dngangs la dngangs par yang 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas
138b6(khri brgyad): ba gang dang ldan pas/ bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngangs shing dngangs par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
138b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
138b8(khri brgyad): dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa so sor rtog te/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang /
139a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtog pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di ni/
139a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
139a3(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang zhe
139a4(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i
139a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa dang / dben pa'i so sor rtog te de yang mi dmigaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang/
139a6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
139a7(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
139a8(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog te/
139b1(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
139b2(khri brgyad): ba la mi rtog ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
139b3(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa
139b4(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ rab 'byor gzugs la sdug bsngal ba zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// tshor ba
139b5(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
139b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de ya
139b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so//
139b8(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzug la zhi zhes bya bar sor rtog ste/
140a1(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so//
140a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bya bas gzugs
140a3(khri brgyad): la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigaso// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar so
140a4(khri brgyad): sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
140a5(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi
140a6(khri brgyad): dmig so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs
140a7(khri brgyad): la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
140a8(khri brgyad): mngon 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang /
140b1(khri brgyad): zhes
140b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben bya bar sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmig so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems/
140b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar so sor rtog
140b4(khri brgyad): pa ni 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
140b5(khri brgyad): bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ce bya bar chos bstan par ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs
140b6(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan pa med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon
140b7(khri brgyad): par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
140b8(khri brgyad): rnam dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya dang / smon pa med
140b9(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o snyam du sems so// rab
141a1(khri brgyad): 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
141a2(khri brgyad): chen po mi skrag/ mi dngangs zhing dngangs par mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
141a3(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa yin la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmig pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
141a4(khri brgyad): pa ma yin la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
141a5(khri brgyad): byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs
141a6(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes par yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /
141a7(khri brgyad): gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par
141a8(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar yid de/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
141b1(khri brgyad): shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pastong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa patshan pa med ces bya ba dag rab pang
141b2(khri brgyad): shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs
141b3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa de/ de nas byang chub sems
141b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngangs zhing dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
141b5(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa na/ chos gang dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang
141b6(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam pa dang / so sor rtog cing brjod
141b7(khri brgyad): pa la 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi ska
141b8(khri brgyad): mi dngangs zhing dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngangs zhing dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// rab
142a1(khri brgyad): bya/ 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen lo mi skrag mi dngangs zhing dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
142a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs
142a3(khri brgyad): mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzug
142a4(khri brgyad): zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba
142a5(khri brgyad): dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag
142a6(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba
142a7(khri brgyad): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi byed de/ de rnam pa thams
142a8(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing / brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson
142b1(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngangs zhing dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang /
142b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gang gis tshe nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang de
142b3(khri brgyad): las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar du gcod pa'i byed dag pa dag pa gis skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/
142b4(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mi skras
142b5(khri brgyad): mi dngangs zhing dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs kyi
142b6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi gzugs stong pa ma yin gyis gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
142b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyis/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi
142b8(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyis/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// snying pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
143a1(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid spong ba ma yin gyis/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/
143a2(khri brgyad): gzugs stong pa ma yin gyis gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis
143a3(khri brgyad): chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyis/ chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid// stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so// mig gi rnam pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gis rnam par
143a4(khri brgyad): shes pa stong pa ma yin te/ mig gis rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gis rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i
143a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin
143a6(khri brgyad): gyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
143a7(khri brgyad): mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin gyis/ mig gis 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gis 'dus te reg pa'o//
143a8(khri brgyad): ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa
143b1(khri brgyad): kanyid kyis 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid pa yin gyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid po/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gis te reg gi
143b2(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyi stong pa ma yin gyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyi stong /
143b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
143b4(khri brgyad): dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi
143b5(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
143b6(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa yin gyis/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang /
143b7(khri brgyad): stong nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhags pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / ston
143b8(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam gyis stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa nyid ma yin gyis/ lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// /
144a1(khri brgyad): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyis stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams song /
144a2(khri brgyad): pa ma yin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
144a3(khri brgyad): da chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas
144a4(khri brgyad): pa yin te/ thabs de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngangs zhing dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
144a5(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongasu zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngangs
144a6(khri brgyad): zhing dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i gshes gnyen dag gang lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' spel pa/ rab
144a7(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i gshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te de yang mi dmig pa'i chu
144a8(khri brgyad): gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang //
144b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de mi dmigs pa'i rdul gyis smon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams/
144b2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngod ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
144b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes snyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes snyen gang de la gzug
144b4(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon
144b5(khri brgyad): par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
144b6(khri brgyad): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan tho kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
144b7(khri brgyad): rnam pa shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa
144b8(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba dang / ma sngon par 'du bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams
145a1(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sem/
145a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes bsnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gshes gnyen ni gang dag de
145a3(khri brgyad): la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar dang / bdag med ces bya bar dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces
145a4(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge
145a5(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba
145a6(khri brgyad): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
145a7(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
145a8(khri brgyad): gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba ste/
145b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
145b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
145b3(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston ste/ de yang mi dmig
145b4(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba dang //
145b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes
145b6(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / sngon par 'du bye ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi
145b7(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
145b8(khri brgyad): kyi sar yongasu bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
146a1(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig gis rnam par shes pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan
146a2(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag de la mig gis 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba mi rtag ces
146a3(khri brgyad): bya ba'i chos ston sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
146a4(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dang chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad
146a5(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ ra sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i dang // rnam par shes dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg
146a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba dang / de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /
146a7(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba
146a8(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs
146b1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu/
146b2(khri brgyad): mi bsngo te/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
146b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmig
146b4(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sar yongasu mi bsngo ba
146b5(khri brgyad): dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phral gyis rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams mi rtag ces
146b6(khri brgyad): bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi ston te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
146b7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sar yong su mi bsngo dang / de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
146b8(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa nyid du bzhug pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmig
147a1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyi ston pa dang / byang chub du bsgom du 'azhugs pa'i phyir chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge 'i
147a2(khri brgyad): rtsa ba de dag kyang ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba de/ rab 'byor de dag ni
147a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/ de dag gis yongasu zin bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngangs zhing dngangs pa
147a4(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/
147a5(khri brgyad): thabs pas sdig pa'i grogs pa'i sug par mchis shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di
147a6(khri brgyad): thos na skrag te dngas zhing dngangs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
147a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas/ shes rab kyi
147a8(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa la bsgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom semasu byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
147b1(khri brgyad): pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin drupa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/
147b2(khri brgyad): slob zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des kyang rlob semasu byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
147b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya
147b4(khri brgyad): yid la byed de/ gzugs phyi stong pa nyid ba ces bya bar yid la byed de/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med
147b5(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong
147b6(khri brgyad): ba nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed
147b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar du yid la byed cing / nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang
147b8(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang /
148a1(khri brgyad): du \u0f7f/ mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed yin phyi nang stong pa zhes par yi la byed/ mig
148a2(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rlom semasu byed pa dang /
148a3(khri brgyad): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar du yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar
148a4(khri brgyad): yid la byed/ yid la dngos por med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlob sems
148a5(khri brgyad): su byed pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang / skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la yang bya'o// de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang /
148a6(khri brgyad): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig/
148a7(khri brgyad): gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa na
148a8(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rlom sem
148b1(khri brgyad): su byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes
148b2(khri brgyad): bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul de dag
148b3(khri brgyad): gis kyang rlom semasu byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad
148b4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang / bral bas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems ma byed pa dang /
148b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags
148b6(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lags brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
148b7(khri brgyad): pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag sgom zhing de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis rlom semasu byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
148b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag te dngangs par 'gyur ro//
149a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pa'i sug par mchis/
149a2(khri brgyad): zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po des yongasu zin pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngangs zhing dngangs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'a
149a3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
149a4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyis/ 'di la slabs par mi bya'o// 'di dag ni snyan ngag mkhan gyis rang bzo yin pas 'di dag ni mnyan par mi
149a5(khri brgyad): bya'o// bzung bar mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par ma bya'o// sgom par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin yid la mi bya'o// gzhan dag la yang
149a6(khri brgyad): bstan par mi bya'o// zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed// bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod
149a7(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
149a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i grogs po'i rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha
149a9(khri brgyad): po sdi ga/
149b1(khri brgyad): sbyir pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya
149b2(khri brgyad): byang du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs na/ 'di skad du rigs bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pas khyod ci zhig bya/ bsam
149b3(khri brgyad): gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrim
149b4(khri brgyad): kyis pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig/ zhe zer zhing khyod la 'brel bar byed do// zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing / bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi brjod pa gang yin pa ste/ ra
149b5(khri brgyad): 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig po'i sdig pa'i 'grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149b6(khri brgyad): chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di lta ste/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ nyan
149b7(khri brgyad): thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes par kyi sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtog
149b8(khri brgyad): pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed/ rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed cing / bdud kyi
149b9(khri brgyad): las 'di lta bu de dag bskyed par 'gyu ro// zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
150a1(khri brgyad): po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i gros
150a2(khri brgyad): po ni/ bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang
150a3(khri brgyad): chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med de/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin no// khyod kyi ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya
150a4(khri brgyad): bar yang mi nus so zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poli/ sdig pa'i
150a5(khri brgyad): grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di
150a6(khri brgyad): skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag dang bang
150a7(khri brgyad): gis stong ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // mig gis rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo //
150a8(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag dang bdag
150b1(khri brgyad): stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi
150b2(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te
150b3(khri brgyad): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
150b4(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
150b5(khri brgyad): pabartson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar bzhag
150b6(khri brgyad): pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong / yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / lam
150b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon paR+Ya 'tshang rgyas pas/
150b8(khri brgyad): ci zhig bya zhes zer ro// zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa stong / rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
151a1(khri brgyad): bya/ pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can rang sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
151a2(khri brgyad): drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong te/ 'di la sang
151a3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyang med byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do// de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
151a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do// zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de
151a5(khri brgyad): dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud
151a6(khri brgyad): sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed
151a7(khri brgyad): pa dag zlog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag la 'dom to/ rje su ston par byed do zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston
151a8(khri brgyad): pa de gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan
151b1(khri brgyad): po dang slob dpon gyis gzugasu cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smra
151b2(khri brgyad): pa dang 'bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang 'bral bar byed cing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbyor bar byed
151b3(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la yang sbyor bar byed/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang sbyor bar
151b4(khri brgyad): bar byed/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyed chos 'di dag bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon sum du gyis shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ci zhi
151b5(khri brgyad): bya zhes zer ba'i/ bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par
151b6(khri brgyad): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can pha ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du/ rigs
151b7(khri brgyad): kyi bu gang gis don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / lag pacad pa dang / rkang pa bcang ba dang / mgon po gcod pa dpag du med pa
151b8(khri brgyad): dag nyams su myongs par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun du zhug
152a1(khri brgyad): dubya/ pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shing / gang la dgra bcom pa'i nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la
152a2(khri brgyad): par gyis shing / ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs
152a3(khri brgyad): por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhon yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ mig mi
152a4(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyi ston/ de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan
152a5(khri brgyad): ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med bye ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
152a6(khri brgyad): lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
152a7(khri brgyad): pa ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du ngan
152a8(khri brgyad): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces
152b1(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
152b2(khri brgyad): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang
152b3(khri brgyad): zhi zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa
152b4(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
152b5(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmig pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud las de lta bu de dag
152b6(khri brgyad): mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas kyang yongasu spang bar bya'o// // shes rab
152b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u ste/ bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
152b8(khri brgyad): pa/ rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang /
153a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to//
153a2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyang skye ba med/ sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' la yang skye ba dang yod pa nyid mi
153a3(khri brgyad): dmig so// rab 'byor byang chub la yang gzhi med/ sems dpa' yang gzho med de/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don do// rab
153a4(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor
153a5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
153a6(khri brgyad): dper na/ sgyu ma la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// mig sgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la
153a7(khri brgyad): gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpen/ de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing
153a8(khri brgyad): mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dbyer na/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid med cing
153b1(khri brgyad): mi dmig so// gzhan yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing /
153b2(khri brgyad): mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gzugs dang / tshor ba
153b3(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
153b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gis gzhi med cing
153b5(khri brgyad): mi dmig so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med cing mi dmig so// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi gzhi med
153b6(khri brgyad): cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dag
153b7(khri brgyad): so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gis rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce
153b8(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
154a1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ smra ba'i skyes bu na
154a2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub se
154a3(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin
154a4(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
154a5(khri brgyad): sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
154a6(khri brgyad): pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing
154a7(khri brgyad): dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi
154a8(khri brgyad): dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzugs kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
154b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di
154b2(khri brgyad): lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med
154b3(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med
154b4(khri brgyad): cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gis gzhi med do// rna ba dang / sna dang /
154b5(khri brgyad): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
154b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi
154b7(khri brgyad): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do// rab 'byor/
154b8(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma/
154b9(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sdong pa nyid kyi kyang bar
155a1(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
155a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do// 'dus byas kyi khams la yang
155a3(khri brgyad): 'dus pa byas kyi bzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don
155a4(khri brgyad): med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
155a5(khri brgyad): gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon
155a6(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i byang
155a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i bzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes pa ma mchis pa la gang gis gzhi ma mchis pa lags/ kun nas nyon mongs
155a8(khri brgyad): pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzugs
155b1(khri brgyad): kyi gzhi med do// skye ba med pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
155b2(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzugs kyi gzhi med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam
155b3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med do// de bzhin du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
155b4(khri brgyad): byang ba med pa'i bar la khams dang skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do// skye ba med pa la byang chub kyi phyogs chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
155b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag gis gzhi med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres
155b6(khri brgyad): pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag gis gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
155b7(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /
155b8(khri brgyad): dmig su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
156a1(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
156a2(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar gyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du bya
156a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na// 'du shes dang /
156a4(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar gyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
156a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs
156a6(khri brgyad): shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chu
156a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan
156a8(khri brgyad): ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// /
156b1(khri brgyad): / de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin du rnam par pa dag pa la mtshan pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
156b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
156b3(khri brgyad): pa rnams shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
156b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /
156b5(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
156b6(khri brgyad): kyi bar dag shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
156b7(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do// shes pa po dang /
156b8(khri brgyad): mthong ba po med pa'i phyir shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar du shin du rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
157a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar
157a2(khri brgyad): ba la mun pa'i gzhi byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don
157a3(khri brgyad): med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sreg pa'i bskal pa la 'du byed thams cad kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
157a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
157a5(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
157a6(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa'i byang sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng ba'i gzhi med do// de bzhin gabye
157a7(khri brgyad): pa'i shes rab la 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par gros
157a8(khri brgyad): ba'i ye shes mthong ba la ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
157b1(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
157b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang skar ma dang nor
157b3(khri brgyad): bu rin po che dang / klog gi 'od la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sem
157b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / 'thab bral gyis lha rnam
157b5(khri brgyad): dang / dga' ldan gyis lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga' lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams dang / 'og sprin gyi lha
157b6(khri brgyad): rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyis 'od la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
157b7(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
157b8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di/
158a1(khri brgyad): lhar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bas
158a2(khri brgyad): par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos
158a3(khri brgyad): thams cad ni gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni ji ltar bslab par bgyis/ byang chub
158a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du chud par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni
158a5(khri brgyad): dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa bcas pa dang / zag pa med
158a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus pa byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mongs dang thun mongs mengs pa yin pa dag go//
158a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sem
158a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba yang de dag yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyan
158b1(khri brgyad): stong pa// / bam po dgu pa// / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten/
158b2(khri brgyad): ba'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams kyi bya ba ni/ phar 'dzin pa dang / mar
158b3(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /
158b4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal lta byed pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i wa
158b5(khri brgyad): kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / lnga brnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhig pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dam
158b6(khri brgyad): pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngo ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam pa thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gis 'du shes dang / rnam
158b7(khri brgyad): bar tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten
158b8(khri brgyad): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes dran pa dang / tshul
159a1(khri brgyad): khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjesu dran pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa rjesu dran pa dang / 'chig
159a2(khri brgyad): rjes su dran pa lus su rtogs pa rjesu dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis
159a3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog
159a4(khri brgyad): gcod pa dang / ma sbyin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal ba dang / brnab sems
159a5(khri brgyad): dang / gnod sems dang / log par blta ba dang / khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phra dog dang / ser
159a6(khri brgyad): sna dang / nga rgyal ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'i rnam shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan
159a7(khri brgyad): ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan za ba'o// ngag gis las ni lung du ma bstan/
159a8(khri brgyad): pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'gyur pa chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye
159b1(khri brgyad): mched drug ni lung du ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa'i stobs par 'jug pa bzhi ni/ lung du ma bstan pa'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams/
159b2(khri brgyad): ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
159b3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched/
159b4(khri brgyad): sa bcu gnyis dang / khams bcwo brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyis lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
159b5(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma togs par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig
159b6(khri brgyad): rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
159b7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la/
159b8(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
160a1(khri brgyad): / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes/
160a2(khri brgyad): pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i
160a3(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na gzugs can
160a4(khri brgyad): gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'dushes pas phyi rol gyis gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni nang par thar pa gnyis pa'o//
160a5(khri brgyad): sdug pa nyid du bos pa 'di ni rnam par pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thog ma'i 'du shes rnam du
160a6(khri brgyad): bar gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ na mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched sgrub te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
160a7(khri brgyad): par thar pa bzhi'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnama'a' mtha' las skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtho' las skye bached las yang dag ma
160a8(khri brgyad): dag par 'das te/ rnam shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rna/
160b1(khri brgyad): shes mtha' las skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o//
160b2(khri brgyad): de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrub te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar
160b3(khri brgyad): bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 1'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni
160b4(khri brgyad): rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag na rnam par thar pa brgyad do// mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i
160b5(khri brgyad): chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben lngas skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang
160b6(khri brgyad): bral zhing / nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtogs pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
160b7(khri brgyad): gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dag dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis
160b8(khri brgyad): myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyi gang ba de 'dra ba dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas gtang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa te/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /
161a1(khri brgyad): @#de bde pa yang spangs snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi 'de nub pas/ bde ba yang ba yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa dang /
161a2(khri brgyad): btang snyoms dang dran pa yongasu dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa yongasu bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las dag par 'das te
161a3(khri brgyad): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yod la mi byed pas dmakha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgru
161a4(khri brgyad): te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas
161a5(khri brgyad): skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas
161a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /
161a7(khri brgyad): de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa sgrubs nas gnas pa te/ de dag ni
161a8(khri brgyad): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
161b1(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams
161b2(khri brgyad): shes bya'o// de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bcwo brgyad dang dang / bsam
161b3(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de bzag
161b4(khri brgyad): ba med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong bzhi dang / dbang rdzu 'phrul
161b5(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzi
161b6(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang
161b7(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de ma yin pa'i gzhan gang dag 'dus byas su btogs pa'i chos/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
161b8(khri brgyad): chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus
162a1(khri brgyad): @ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la skyes pa 'am/ 'jig pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang bdag ste/ 'dod chags/
162a2(khri brgyad): zad pa dang / zhes sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan pa yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
162a3(khri brgyad): kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mongs kyi
162a4(khri brgyad): chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag gi mthun
162a5(khri brgyad): mongs gis chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mongs ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig
162a6(khri brgyad): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni mthun mongs
162a7(khri brgyad): ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa dang /
162a8(khri brgyad): dpyod pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa'i chos rnams la chags med pa dang / yong ba ma yin par bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul
162b1(khri brgyad): du long du chud par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang gnas
162b2(khri brgyad): bgyi ba ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang /
162b3(khri brgyad): sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
162b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyis tshogs chen po ni gang lags/ sems can gyis ris phal po che ni gang lags/ bcom ldan
162b5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyis tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir
162b6(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa dang / dgra bcom pa dang / 6/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
162b7(khri brgyad): chen po'i bar dag go// rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyis ris phal che zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
162b8(khri brgyad): phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed do// sems can gyis tshogs chen po dang / sems
163a1(khri brgyad): can gyis ris phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/
163a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems
163a3(khri brgyad): can thams cad theg pa gsum gyi yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
163a4(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sprod par bya'o// bdag gis
163a5(khri brgyad): thams cad kyis rje su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su bsgrubs pa la bslab par bya'o// chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis
163a6(khri brgyad): chos dpag tu med pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
163a7(khri brgyad): sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na thos sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i rnga
163a8(khri brgyad): byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed do// sems can dam
163b1(khri brgyad): mong bar
163b2(khri brgyad): ba dang du 'gro'i skyes dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyis tshar bor 'gyur ba de dgags dong du bdag sdug bsngal gyis tshar bde/
163b3(khri brgyad): nyams su myong bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di lta bu bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems /
163b4(khri brgyad): de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gis don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
163b5(khri brgyad): phrag 'bum mang po// sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de ltar bus sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya
163b6(khri brgyad): las 'das pa'i dbyings mya ngan las bzlas par 'a gyur gyis bar du/ sems can thams cad kyi mched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nas su myong bar
163b7(khri brgyad): bya'o// phyis gdong bdag gis don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa 'di de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bskul la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
163b8(khri brgyad): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdon
163b9(khri brgyad): lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro//
164a1(khri brgyad): sems
164a2(khri brgyad): bya/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' blos can thams cad kyi phul du gyur pa'i sems brlabs po che rtag par rgyun tu bskyed par
164a3(khri brgyad): bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhes sdang
164a4(khri brgyad): gi sems mi bskyed gti mugi sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi bskyed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sem
164a5(khri brgyad): brlabs po che yin te/ des sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cing / des rloms sems su yang mi byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
164a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skal ba'i semasu'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi bskal pa ni 'di yin te/ gang rnam pa thams cad
164a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rlom sems mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bskal ba'o// rab 'byor/
164a8(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang 'de bar gnas pa'i mam pa
164a9(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad stobs cing / sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong la des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
164a10(khri brgyad): mas can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i
164b1(khri brgyad): phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ sems can thams/
164b2(khri brgyad): cad kyi phul du byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag pa rgyun du chos
164b3(khri brgyad): 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun du dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun du dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/
164b4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste de ni chos shes bya'o// de la 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos la 'dod cing mos pa ste de ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la
164b5(khri brgyad): dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la kun du dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la yon tan dang
164b6(khri brgyad): phan yon du lta ba ste/ de la kun du dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed
164b7(khri brgyad): ste/ de ni chos la kun du dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
164b8(khri brgyad): pa la de ltar spyod pas sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyis ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi bya'o//
165a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/
165a2(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod kyi bar la gnas nas sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyis ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs/
165a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu
165a4(khri brgyad): rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/
165a5(khri brgyad): sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyis phul po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
165a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ ka ltar chags pa med pas/ rnam pa
165a7(khri brgyad): grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyis tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de ya
165a8(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la
165b1(khri brgyad): gnas te/ sems can gyis tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris pal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' se/
165b2(khri brgyad): dpal chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// / khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o//
165b3(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
165b4(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bus don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
165b5(khri brgyad): chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spongs par bgyis shig/ sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag du lta ba spangs pa'i slad du sems can rnams la chos
165b6(khri brgyad): ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du blta ba dang / srog du lta ba dang / gang zag du blta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes pa dang /
165b7(khri brgyad): shed bu dang / phreng ba po dang / byed du 'jog pa po dang / slong ngo bo dang/ kun nas spong ba po dang / tshor bapo dang / tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po rang
165b8(khri brgyad): shes pa po dang / mthong ba por blta ba dang / chang par blta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang /
166a1(khri brgyad): khams su blta ba dang / skye mched du blta ba dang / bden par lta ba dang / brten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar blta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par/
166a2(khri brgyad): lta ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su blta ba dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems can
