166a3(khri brgyad): yongs su smin par bgyi bar blta da dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par blta bgyi ba dang / byang chub tu blta ba dang / sangs rgyas su blta ba dang / chos su
166a4(khri brgyad): blta ba dang / dge 'dun du blta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spangs pa'i slad du mi dmigs pa'i tshul
166a5(khri brgyad): gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang
166a6(khri brgyad): ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu blta bar 'gyur
166a7(khri brgyad): ba yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur
166a8(khri brgyad): ba yin/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu bra la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas
166b1(khri brgyad): gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lha ga/
166b2(khri brgyad): bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu lta bar 'gyur pa yino// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre ba'i bar du blta
166b3(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ba yin/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spangs pa'i phyir
166b4(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang
166b5(khri brgyad): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs/
166b6(khri brgyad): par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
166b7(khri brgyad): thams cad dang / thun mongs pa lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de yang chags pa ma mchis pas don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe/
166b8(khri brgyad): bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongasu gtogs pa ma lags te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/
167a1(khri brgyad): bya/ kyi sems zag pa ma mchis khongasu gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub
167a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang
167a3(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin
167a4(khri brgyad): pa'i sems de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang pa sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskyed phyin chad chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag/
167a5(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan
167a6(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
167a7(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/ che/
167a8(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin/
167b1(khri brgyad): pa'i sems so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa khong su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa/
167b2(khri brgyad): sems de la yang chags pa med ces smra na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa/
167b3(khri brgyad): shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
167b4(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang
167b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du yang chags pa med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyi 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
167b6(khri brgyad): kyi sems gang yin pa/ de la zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin zhes smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyi
167b7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
167b8(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir zag pa med cing 'ongasu gtogs pa ma yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
168a1(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri
168a2(khri brgyad): bu de de bzhin no// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
168a3(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri/
168a4(khri brgyad): bus ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so skye bo rnams kyang rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med pa'i khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs
168a5(khri brgyad): rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin no// gzug
168a6(khri brgyad): kyang rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa
168a7(khri brgyad): ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
168a8(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yino// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod
168b1(khri brgyad): kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan par byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med dag tshang ba yang
168b2(khri brgyad): tshor ba la chags pa med dam/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa yang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pa
168b3(khri brgyad): med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang
168b4(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// rab 'byor gyi smras
168b5(khri brgyad): ba// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang //
168b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
168b7(khri brgyad): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa
168b8(khri brgyad): med do// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar smod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos
169a1(khri brgyad): @#rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thud phongs pa yin pa'i sems des chos thams cad kyi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sem su 'gyur ba med/ mngon dang
169a2(khri brgyad): zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lta ba
169a3(khri brgyad): spangs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
169a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod
169a5(khri brgyad): spobs par gyis shig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen bgos pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lag
169a6(khri brgyad): te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i dus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po
169a7(khri brgyad): la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri
169a8(khri brgyad): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe sems can gyi ched du/ byang chub kyi phyir smod pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/ sem can
169b1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed po/ nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas sa rdul
169b2(khri brgyad): khrims bsrung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ngo // nyi tshe'i sems can gyi ched du brjod
169b3(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom par byed do// nyi tshe'i
169b4(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa ma yin/ sems can thams cad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
169b5(khri brgyad): te/ bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan rnams bskyed do// nyi tshe'i sems can
169b6(khri brgyad): rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab
169b7(khri brgyad): bsgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed gcig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las bzlas par
169b8(khri brgyad): bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o// zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dge
169b9(khri brgyad): son thaMd kyi che du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom par byed// nyi tshe'i son rnams kyi
170a1(khri brgyad): / par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon
170a2(khri brgyad): no// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o//
170a3(khri brgyad): bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes
170a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o snyam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
170a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gi sa ma yin gyis/ rnam
170a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mongs du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
170a7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha
170a8(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis
170b1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa sbyin zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
170b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
170b3(khri brgyad): bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa gang yang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i/
170b4(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa sbyin pa/ rnam
170b5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus pa btang ba yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin bI pha rol tu phyin
170b6(khri brgyad): ba la spyod pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
170b7(khri brgyad): sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
170b8(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i
171a1(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
171a2(khri brgyad): sbyin zhing de gcig pu la mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad dmigs la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / de sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ smin pa yang
171a3(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/ len pa po mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
171a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis pha
171a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
171a6(khri brgyad): smod pa/ go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
171a7(khri brgyad): bo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de yang sems can thams cad thun mongs du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
171a8(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha
171b1(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dod pa med pa zeng
171b2(khri brgyad): na so so skye bo'i sa la smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
171b3(khri brgyad): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
171b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i bye ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
171b5(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o slong // tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
171b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus mi nyams mi gong pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
171b7(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
171b8(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems can
172a1(khri brgyad): @rnams kyis skabs mi byed cing / sems can bskyed pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas na/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
172a2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin
172a3(khri brgyad): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin
172a4(khri brgyad): lo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos tha
172a5(khri brgyad): cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims des rlom semasu 'ang mi byed la/ mi dmigs pa de ni tshe dang ldan
172a6(khri brgyad): ba sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
172a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad kyang yongasu 'dzin te/ de'i phyir
172a8(khri brgyad): go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ nyan thos dang / rang
172b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis pa yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'iH/
172b2(khri brgyad): ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sem
172b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa
172b4(khri brgyad): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam go tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
172b5(khri brgyad): sem dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyis/ shes rab kyis
172b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu
172b7(khri brgyad): smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sem can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo
172b8(khri brgyad): ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
173a1(khri brgyad): gis ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gi sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sem
173a2(khri brgyad): can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsom
173a3(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brjo
173a4(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhi no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
173a5(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
173a6(khri brgyad): bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
173a7(khri brgyad): yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzha
173a8(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan tho dang / rang sang rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyis/
173b1(khri brgyad): rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mongs du byas te/ bla na med pa yang
173b2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
173b3(khri brgyad): pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin /
173b4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing
173b5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gi ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad
173b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas te/ bla na med pa yang ba dag par rdzogs pa'i
173b7(khri brgyad): byang chub du bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
173b8(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sang rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gi ma yin gyis//
174a1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ 'khor gsuM yongasu dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sem can thams cad dang hrung
174a2(khri brgyad): mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol
174a3(khri brgyad): du phyin pa'o// she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin d+hA'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bas gtan gyis pa
174a4(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
174a5(khri brgyad): pa bsgo zhing / de pha rol tu phyin pa tham cad dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig gor dang / brag cha dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gan
174a6(khri brgyad): ba ma yin te/ de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas/
174a7(khri brgyad): shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang drub du yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
174a8(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa la re re la gnas te/
174a9(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/
174b1(khri brgyad): pha rol ga phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs tshogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bugazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pani
174b2(khri brgyad): bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug la/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ro byang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de
174b3(khri brgyad): ngag gis dbang gi kyang mi bskyed/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la yang stom par 'jug la/ ro myang bar yang mi
174b4(khri brgyad): byed cing / de dag gis ma phrogs la/ de dag gis dbang gis kyang mi skye te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' che
174b5(khri brgyad): po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang
174b6(khri brgyad): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas/ gnas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong nas/
174b7(khri brgyad): gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i gom
174b8(khri brgyad): chen po yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha gos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
175a1(khri brgyad): chen po de ltar go cha bgos pa la/ phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyis khams ga ge mo zhig na tshe dang ldan
175a2(khri brgyad): pa sha ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongasu smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par
175a3(khri brgyad): byed ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing bsngags pa yang gsungs la ming yang yongasu bsgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra brjod pa yang mdzad la/ dbyangs
175a4(khri brgyad): rjesu sgrogs pa yang mdzad do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
175a5(khri brgyad): zhags pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yang / gang pos smras pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha ro//
175a6(khri brgyad): du phyin pa drug la spyod cing / de smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpya
175a7(khri brgyad): pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po bsgrub te gnas gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsuM pa dang /
175a8(khri brgyad): ba bsgrub te gnas pa dang / de byams dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa brgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa 'khon med pa 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med dang //
175b1(khri brgyad): shing du bsgoms pas/ 'jigs rten chos kyi dbyings kyis bklas pa/ na mkha'i khams kyi mthar gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje
175b2(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / gtang snyoms pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis dang / khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/
175b3(khri brgyad): gnod pa med pa/ shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyis dbyings klas pa na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du
175b4(khri brgyad): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa de ni
175b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems
175b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dang /
175b7(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa de dag la snyom par 'jug cing ldang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thos cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang
175b8(khri brgyad): tu yongasu bsngo bar byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu
176a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
176a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/ gang gi tshe
176a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan de dang / chad med pa de dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing / de bsam
176a4(khri brgyad): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa la ldang ba na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams yid
176a5(khri brgyad): la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
176a6(khri brgyad): gis sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su sngo bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
176a7(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
176a8(khri brgyad): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa/ sems yangs pa rgya chen po kho na med pa dang / 'gran
176b1(khri brgyad): cwo med pa dang / gnod pa med pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi kra/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' btugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par
176b2(khri brgyad): byas te gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa yang de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
176b3(khri brgyad): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa mi gnyis pa/ 'khon med ga'agran
176b4(khri brgyad): zla med pa gnod pa med pa/ shin du bsgom pa/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re ba
176b5(khri brgyad): byas nas gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa
176b6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rtsal ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad
176b7(khri brgyad): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la yang brjod cing ston te/ rab tu 'chad la rnam par byed de gsal bar byed cing de dag gi ro//
176b8(khri brgyad): myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / nges par 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
177a1(khri brgyad): @rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyi bsam gtan dang po/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag
177a2(khri brgyad): gnod cing sgom ste/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de dag la yang gnas la/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
177a3(khri brgyad): sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med/
177a4(khri brgyad): ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de ni 'di snyam du sems te/
177a5(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam nas/ yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / yongs su rtog
177a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
177a7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ dge ba cag
177a8(khri brgyad): de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo zhing / brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni/ byang chub
177b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis chernam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
177b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldan yang
177b3(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
177b4(khri brgyad): ba'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
177b5(khri brgyad): gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang /
177b6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtogs pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong
177b7(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i so sor rnam par rtog ta de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
177b8(khri brgyad): phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
178a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
178a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i
178a3(khri brgyad): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs
178a4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag sgom pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na
178a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
178a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad sgrub bo zhes mang bar bzhol bar byed pa dang / snying rje'i
178a7(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang ston
178a8(khri brgyad): par 'jug cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad sgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la
178b1(khri brgyad): yang snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya la/ nges par gzhol bar byed pa byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems/
178b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis tshe bsam gtan dang /
178b3(khri brgyad): tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag la snyom par 'jug cing ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
178b4(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
178b5(khri brgyad): pha nag nog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
178b6(khri brgyad): 'jug pa dag gis ma 'dres par gnas shing / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gnyis de dag du 'dod par mi byed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
178b7(khri brgyad): bzod cing / 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad med pa rnams spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems
178b8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis tshe/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i
179a1(khri brgyad): chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
179a2(khri brgyad): po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis tshe/ bsam gtan de
179a3(khri brgyad): ngag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la 'ang snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste/
179a4(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ de dag gis ro myang bar yang mi
179a5(khri brgyad): byed cing de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
179a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ bsam gtan dang /
179a7(khri brgyad): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug pa cing ldang bar byed la de yang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal
179a8(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnams pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa
179b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang / nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
179b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/
179b3(khri brgyad): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
179b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
179b5(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
179b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
179b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par bzhag par shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
179b8(khri brgyad): bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
180a1(khri brgyad): dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
180a2(khri brgyad): chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang /
180a3(khri brgyad): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi steng zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /
180a4(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni/ byang chub
180a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o theg pa chen po yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
180a6(khri brgyad): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma
180a7(khri brgyad): 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug la/ de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang
180a8(khri brgyad): ldan pa sha ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
180b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
180b2(khri brgyad): ba chen po'i ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'dod pa'i
180b3(khri brgyad): khams dang / gzugs med khams mi shes pa ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
180b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//
180b5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug/ 'jig rten
180b6(khri brgyad): las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la
180b7(khri brgyad): yang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
180b8(khri brgyad): zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul
181a1(khri brgyad): gyis de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
181a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
181a3(khri brgyad): gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po yang gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di
181a4(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ des sbyin
181a5(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub
181a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
181a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas
181a8(khri brgyad): pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
181b1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la yang yang dag par gnas la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa
181b2(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
181b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sem
181b4(khri brgyad): ma 'dres par/ bsgom pa rnam par gzhig par bya ba'i phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
181b5(khri brgyad): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres dag gis sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
181b6(khri brgyad): sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang /
181b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ma 'dres pa dag gis sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyog
181b8(khri brgyad): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag
182a1(khri brgyad): @#gis sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i
182a2(khri brgyad): tshul gyis bsgomo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par bzhig pa'i phyir/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa
182a3(khri brgyad): bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag sgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom// tshe dang
182a4(khri brgyad): ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
182a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni tha snyad tsam du zad par shes so// gzugs dmig
182a6(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba de yang ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang /
182a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ mig ces bya ba
182a8(khri brgyad): de ni ming tsam du zad do// yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ yid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
182b1(khri brgyad): brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcurtsa bdun dang / spobs bcu dang / me 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par/
182b2(khri brgyad): rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang de bzhin no// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de
182b3(khri brgyad): ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi
182b4(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/
182b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmig
182b6(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar na
182b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
182b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ sems dang po brgyad pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub snying po la 'dug gi bar du/ sems
183a1(khri brgyad): @can rnams yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang sangs rgyas kyi/
183a2(khri brgyad): zhing na/ gang la gang 'os pa'i mchod pa dang / rim 'gro ba dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sti stang du byed do// tha mar byed do// ri mor byed do//
183a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid kyi chos ston no// de theg pa chen po de la zhon te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
183a4(khri brgyad): kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/ de la sangs
183a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te/ lus ci lta bus sems can rnams kyi
183a6(khri brgyad): don byed nus pa de lta bu lus bsam bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ye shes thob par gyur gyi bar du nam du yang theg pa de dang 'bras
183a7(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ro// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
183a8(khri brgyad): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus
183b1(khri brgyad): pa'i makyim ma nas da pa sa yang ga par jugs pa na chu pa ngas rgyas pa/ klu phyogs 'ji na kyis 'as pa nga /
183b2(khri brgyad): bi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyis khams rab 'byam ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/
183b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ theg pa chen po la zhon nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad
183b4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhes snyan pa bsgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad do// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang dang
183b5(khri brgyad): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / nub bying dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
183b6(khri brgyad): bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams/ ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/
183b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas
183b8(khri brgyad): kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhes snyan pa bsgogs shing / dbyangs brjod par mdzad do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems
184a1(khri brgyad): mamang na sa /
184a2(khri brgyad): pa rgyad byung bsas// tsun badrug gis sa kyi bcu gsul paro// / 'bams pa
184a3(khri brgyad): ma tu gtu rgyang stong / bam pa pa'oro// demam pacom ldan 'das
184a4(khri brgyad): ldan pa pa rdzo gas 'di da sa gas/ ma ldan 'das gi chen pa gas shes pakhyen/ bam ldana'adas seMm kyis na byang chub
184a5(khri brgyad): sems pa na pa/ chen pa can shes kyigs shes/ du sa kyis ka' sum ga rang 'bye sa byung chub mas pa
184a6(khri brgyad): mas na pa pa nga/ 'dus pa na pa'i la na pa na / ga rdzos kyi sa na
184a7(khri brgyad): kyi zhin gas pa yo da du chu na pa nga bang bdang/ da tha
184b1(khri brgyad): gyi go cha dgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha 'gos/ mi 'jigs glo ma bgos/
184b2(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/
184b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams snang bas khyab par byed cing g.yo bar byed de/ sems can dmyal
184b4(khri brgyad): ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab du zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam rab du zhi bar rig par byed cing /
184b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
184b6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyangs skrag go// de nas sems can dmyal ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi sgra de dag thos nas bde ba dang yid bde ba thob ste bde ba dang
184b7(khri brgyad): yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te mthong zhing mnyes par byar yod pa dang /
184b8(khri brgyad): lha dang mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyis khams de dang der skye'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas sems can rnams
185a1(khri brgyad): byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye'o// de bzhin tu shar dang /
185a2(khri brgyad): nub dang / lho dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
185a3(khri brgyad): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed cing / rnam pa drug du g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyis gnas rnam su re
185a4(khri brgyad): rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal po'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams
185a5(khri brgyad): las thar bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' des 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag
185a6(khri brgyad): 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyangs sgrogs so// de nas sems can dmyal ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ bde ba dang yid bde ba
185a7(khri brgyad): thob ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyi sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/ gang dang gan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te mthong
185a8(khri brgyad): zhing bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang / lha rang mir skye bar gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o/ mir skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
185b1(khri brgyad): mnyes par byed do// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas gnam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams nas/ sems can dag shi 'phos te gang dang gang nas
185b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyis khams de dang der skye'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
185b3(khri brgyad): go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gi lam po ri'i bzhi mdor
185b4(khri brgyad): skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sems can dmyal ba dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mngon par sprul nas sems can thams
185b5(khri brgyad): cad la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra bsgrags te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge
185b6(khri brgyad): 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba de dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas byung bar 'gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di snyam
185b7(khri brgyad): du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nas sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
185b8(khri brgyad): rje'i 'jig rten dag nas phyung ba yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom nga ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
186a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag du med pa rnams su sems
186a2(khri brgyad): can rnams ngan 'gro gsum po dag las yongasu bkrol yang / sems can 'ga' yang yongs su dkrol bar gyur pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
186a3(khri brgyad): sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzungs nas chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
186a4(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sba pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas gnas te na chen po bgos nas/ stong gsum gyis
186a5(khri brgyad): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul te/ stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin du
186a6(khri brgyad): mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sbrel bar byed do// de nas 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/ zas
186a7(khri brgyad): 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin par byed do// de bzhin du btung ba dang / gos dang / gzhon pa dang / spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa
186a8(khri brgyad): dang phyug pa dang / phye ma dang / yo byad dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / bgo ba dang / mchod pa'i yo byad dang / rtsi sman dang / gser dang /
186b1(khri brgyad): dngul dang // nor bu dang / rin po che dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dag dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba dag smin par byed do//
186b2(khri brgyad): des zas 'dod pa rnam la zas byin zhing yo byad yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa
186b3(khri brgyad): 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
186b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyis bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis slob
186b5(khri brgyad): ma mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i bdun du skye bo'i tshogs mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin na/ mi'i
186b6(khri brgyad): yo byad gang yang rung ba byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyis slob ma des/ sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa
186b7(khri brgyad): yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los
186b8(khri brgyad): bsgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang
187a1(khri brgyad): ci yang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ smra ba'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyis chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir
187a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po dgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
187a3(khri brgyad): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i ris su skyes te/ de 'khor los
187a4(khri brgyad): kha sbyar ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
187a5(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god par byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la 'god par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
187a6(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god cing / sems de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas kyis bar du nam
187a7(khri brgyad): yang chos bstan pa de dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyis slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam
187a8(khri brgyad): che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god cing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ban+de
187b1(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyum mkhan gyis slob pa des/ sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i/
187b2(khri brgyad): las kyi lam la 'god pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
187b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos grangs med
187b4(khri brgyad): tshad med pa dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang
187b5(khri brgyad): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis bar dag la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
187b6(khri brgyad): sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha
187b7(khri brgyad): chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams
187b8(khri brgyad): cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spor zhing 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
188a1(khri brgyad): @gnas te/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
188a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos te/ gol te sems can thams cad kyis bdag la dbyig pa dang / bong ba dang / khu tshur dang /
188a3(khri brgyad): lag cha dang / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de dag la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o snyam zhing sems can thams cad kyang bzod
188a4(khri brgyad): ba de lta bu la 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slo ba ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo pa la
188a5(khri brgyad): po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan
188a6(khri brgyad): nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
188a7(khri brgyad): de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs med
188a8(khri brgyad): tshad med pa dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
188b1(khri brgyad): sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
188b2(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad brtson
188b3(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad
188b4(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'dzud de 'god ces/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
188b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par
188b6(khri brgyad): 'dzin du 'dzud de dgod par byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun skye bo'i
188b7(khri brgyad): tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing bcud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du
188b8(khri brgyad): sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing btsud de bkod
189a1(khri brgyad): @pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
189a2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
189a3(khri brgyad): cing bcud de bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing bcud de bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir
189a4(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
189a5(khri brgyad): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
189a6(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
189a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du
189a8(khri brgyad): 'jug cing btsud de 'god ces na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos thams cad kyi mnyam nyid la gnas shing chos gang
189b1(khri brgyad): la yang rnam par g.yeng ba 'am/ rnam par g.yeng ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
189b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
189b3(khri brgyad): pa la yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing 'dzud de dgod par byed do// yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
189b4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bsam gtun gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar sa mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di
189b5(khri brgyad): lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po re'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig
189b6(khri brgyad): mngon par sprul nas/ bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jug nga 'dzud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji
189b7(khri brgyad): snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du btsud de bko/
189b8(khri brgyad): kha yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis las so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
190a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
190a2(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
190a3(khri brgyad): sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
190a4(khri brgyad): bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams
190a5(khri brgyad): cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'dzud du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
190a6(khri brgyad): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce
190a7(khri brgyad): na rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/
190a8(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rol lam/ pha rol mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
190b1(khri brgyad): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
190b2(khri brgyad): cing 'dzud de 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo la
190b3(khri brgyad): be che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing bcud de bkod na/ rab
190b4(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam
190b5(khri brgyad): 'amata rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
190b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
190b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
190b8(khri brgyad): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha
191a1(khri brgyad): @sh+ya/ chen po bgos pa na/ shar phyogs 'jig rten gyis khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha
191a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa shin tu 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par
191a3(khri brgyad): 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
191a4(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan byis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang / shes
191a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar drag yang bar 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed la/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyis chos
191a6(khri brgyad): kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
191a7(khri brgyad): nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang /
191a8(khri brgyad): nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag gi sprin
191b1(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'bod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
191b2(khri brgyad): par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do// de bzhin du ji ltar bdag rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
191b3(khri brgyad): kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin sems can de dag kyang shes rab
191b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god pa 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can
191b5(khri brgyad): de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du ni yang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral
191b6(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyis slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i
191b7(khri brgyad): mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam
191b8(khri brgyad): du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis slob ma des sems can thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing btsud de
192a1(khri brgyad): @#bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das
192a2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi khams gang ga'i klung
192a3(khri brgyad): gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sems can de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

192a6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi gnas shing / sems bskyed pa gzhan zhig gis skabs mi byed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sprin
192a7(khri brgyad): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

192b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed gcig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed
192b2(khri brgyad): cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par
192b3(khri brgyad): mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni
192b4(khri brgyad): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di skad cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//
192b5(khri brgyad): sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
192b6(khri brgyad): ba nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// snyam du mi sems kyi gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can chad med
192b7(khri brgyad): grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o// byang chub spyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
192b8(khri brgyad): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la dgod par
193a1(khri brgyad): bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// lan cig byar 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
193a2(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// bdag gi sems can tshad med/ grangs med pa dag rnam pa thams cad
193a3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi
193a4(khri brgyad): mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag
193a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / sangs rgyas
193a6(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub
193a7(khri brgyad): kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o sems bskyed na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma
193a8(khri brgyad): mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyis slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar la bkod pa yod/
193b1(khri brgyad): snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
193b2(khri brgyad): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa
193b3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mchog dang ldan pa dag la dgod pa'i sems bskyed kyang / sems can 'ga'i phyir yang sems bskyed pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
193b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
