219b8(khri brgyad): dri ma dang / mgo bo dang / glad pa dang / mig rdul dang / rna lpags dag yod do snyam du rtog go// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
220a1(khri brgyad): / rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ rkun dang shes pa shin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/
220a2(khri brgyad): nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/
220a3(khri brgyad): dur khrod na gnas pa na dur khrod du bor ba'i gzugs rtogs/ shi nas zhag gcig lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag gsum lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag
220a4(khri brgyad): bzhi lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag lnga lon pa 'am/ rnam par sngos pa 'am/ rnam par rul ba'am/ rnam par 'bus bzhig pa dag mthong ba na/ nga'i lus 'di yang 'di lta
220a5(khri brgyad): de bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no// zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
220a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes pa can dran pas/ 'jig rten la bsnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lusaso la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so// rab
220a7(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du pi re bor ba/ shi nas zhag drug lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag bdun lon pa 'am/ bya rog rnams/
220a8(khri brgyad): za zhing 'dug pa'amago bo dang tshun lag dang / bya rgod dang / skyugs pa za ba dang / sbrang gu dang / wa dang / khyi dag dang / srog chags kyi rigs gang yang rung ba rnams pa
220b1(khri brgyad): sna tshogs dag pa zhing 'dug pa dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos cad dang 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid 'di lta bu dang ma bral ba'o zhes lus 'dishi
220b2(khri brgyad): tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can nadran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang //
220b3(khri brgyad): yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ phyi rol gyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe dur khrod
220b4(khri brgyad): du mi ro bor ba rnam par zos pa dang / mi gtsang ba dang / rul ba dang / gnam par mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can
220b5(khri brgyad): yin te/ chos nyid 'di dang mi bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes
220b6(khri brgyad): bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brda' sems dang yid mi bde ba rnams bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnaso// rab 'byor gzhon yang byang chub
220b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe dur khrod du keng rus sha dang khrag ra ri chags shing rgyus pas breng breng du badrug mthong ba dang / de'i lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang /
220b8(khri brgyad): 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no// lus de nyid kyang tshul de dang spor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
221a1(khri brgyad): chen po brtun pa shes bzhin can/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la 'arnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnams par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lA
221a2(khri brgyad): zhing gnas so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe dur khrod du keng rus sha dang khrag med cing rgyus pas ma 'brel ba/ dung gi mdog
221a3(khri brgyad): ltar gyur pa mthong ba dang / de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de mi 'bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyi ngang tshul de
221a4(khri brgyad): dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab sems dang / yid mi
221a5(khri brgyad): bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas te/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du keng rus bzung
221a6(khri brgyad): med pa gyes te dung sa la gtor ba lta bu dag mthong ba na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid dang ma bral ba yin no zhes
221a7(khri brgyad): lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la brnab
221a8(khri brgyad): sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas/ lus la lus kyis rjes su lta zhing gnas so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi/
221b1(khri brgyad): dur khrod du rus pa rnams sa la phyogs dang phyogs 'tshabs su rnam par 'thor te rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhanan/ rje ngar gyi rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ bad+ma rus pa rnam kyan
221b2(khri brgyad): gzhan na/ dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ rgal tshigs rnams kyang gzhan na/ rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ dpung pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ 'jing pa'i rus
221b3(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyang gzhan na/ mgo bo'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan na 'dug pa dag mthong na/ de lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ chos nyid de dang
221b4(khri brgyad): ma bral ba yin no// zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan

221b6(khri brgyad): chen po gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du rus pa lo du ba lon pa rlung dang nyi mas gdung ba/ dung gi mdog ltar gru pa dag mthong ba na/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i rdo can dang 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin te/
221b7(khri brgyad): chos nyid de dang ma bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid kyang tshul de dang sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin dran pa dang
221b8(khri brgyad): ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba rnams bsal ste/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnaso// rab 'byor gang gi tshe gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' semA da pa chen po
222a1(khri brgyad): gang gi tshe/ dur khrod du rus pa lo dub lon pa/ sngon po mthi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/ zegs shing brul ba sa'i rdul dang 'dra ba dag mthong na/
222a2(khri brgyad): de'i dus 'di lta bu'i chos can dang / 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin te/ de nyid de dang mi bral ba yin no zhes lus 'di nyid tshul de dang sbyar bar byed do// rab 'byor 'di ltar na
222a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba rnams bsal nas/ nang gi lus la
222a4(khri brgyad): lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnaso// phyi'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas so// nang dang phyi'i lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnaso// de bzhin du brtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa ldan
222a5(khri brgyad): pas// 'jig rten la brnab sems dang yid mi bde bar rnam par bsal nas/ tshor ba rnams dang sems dang chos rnams la chos kyi rje su lta zhing gan so// rab 'byor de ni
222a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i ni 'di
222a7(khri brgyad): lha ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'o// shi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed
222a8(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir mdun pa skyed cing rtsol ba brtson 'grus brtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams spang
222b1(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing rtsol ba la brtson 'grus rtsom te/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir
222b2(khri brgyad): mdun pa skyed cing rtsol la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas bdag phyir zhing 'byung
222b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / mi rjed pa dang / nyam par mi 'gyur ba dang / yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing rtsol ba dang brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang
222b4(khri brgyad): dag par 'jog pa dang / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi 'jog ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor
222b5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg po 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhes na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
222b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas
222b7(khri brgyad): pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong ba la gnas pa/ yongasu sgyur bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus dang sems dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed
222b8(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas par rnam par spong du yongasu sgyur ba sgom zhing / de yang
223a1(khri brgyad): mi dmig pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po'i theg po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
223a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste dbang po lnga'o// lnga gang zhes na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin
223a3(khri brgyad): gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sem dpa' sem
223a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ stobs lnga'o// lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /
223a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi stobs de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang
223a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
223a7(khri brgyad): lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag da shin
223a8(khri brgyad): du spangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / gtang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod

223b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum te/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid
223b7(khri brgyad): kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid
223b8(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang so sor rtogs pa'i sems gnas pa gang yin pa de ni// stong pa nyid kyi stong pa rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la
224a1(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par sems stogs pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo
224a2(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa gang gi
224a3(khri brgyad): ba ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gi ting nge 'dzin na byang chub sems dpa' sems
224a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag la de dag la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa

224a6(khri brgyad): skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjesu rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / yongs su 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa shes pa dang / de la sdug bsngal
224a7(khri brgyad): shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung spang ba /

224b1(khri brgyad): sa pa zhes bya'o// de la lam shes pa gang yin zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lag brgyad pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o// de la zad shes/

224b5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o// de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyi shes pa gang yin pa'o// /

224b7(khri brgyad): sgra thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa'o// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
224b8(khri brgyad): po yin// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dbang po gsuM ste/ mi she pa kun par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i
225a1(khri brgyad): dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'o// des mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob ma'i gang zag mngon par rtog pa de/
225a2(khri brgyad): ma gyur pa rnams kyis dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po snang ba med pa dregs
225a3(khri brgyad): dul ba gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni mi she pa kun she bar byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o// de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag kun she bar gyur pa rnam
225a4(khri brgyad): kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang dran pa'i dbang po dang / ti nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / she rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun she ba'i dbang po zhe bya'o/
225a5(khri brgyad): de dag la kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ mi slob pa gang zag dgra btso ba rnam dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub seMs dpa' rnam dang / de bzhin gsheg pa
225a6(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / she rab kyi dang
225a7(khri brgyad): bo gang yin pa ste/ de ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhe bya ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yi no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sem dang/
225a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ ti nge 'dzin gsu mo// gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa dpyod pa rtsa gyi ting
225b1(khri brgyad): dang / mi tsas mi byed pa'i nga nge 'dzin to// de la rtog pa dang bcas dbyong ba dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang she na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod
225b2(khri brgyad): chags pa dag la dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bas
225b3(khri brgyad): gtan dang po sgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de ni rtogs pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la rtogs pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
225b4(khri brgyad): gtan dang po// bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/ de ni rtogs pa med pa dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de lta mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam
225b5(khri brgyad): gtan gnyis pa na/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gang yin pa dag ste/ 'di ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor de ni
225b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste rje su dran pa
225b7(khri brgyad): bcu'o// bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjesu dran pa dang / gtong ba rjesu dran pa dang / lha rjesu dran pa dang / skye ba rjesu dran
225b8(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'chi ba rjesu dran pa dang / lus su togs pa rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba rjesu dran pa'o// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rjesu dran par byed pa dang /
226a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor rjesu dran pa bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sem da
226a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste tshad bla bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa chad med pa mi dmigs pa khon med pa 'gran
226a3(khri brgyad): zla med pa gnod pa med pa shin du sgom pas 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i khab kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyad par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du ni
226a4(khri brgyad): rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / gtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa'i tshad med pa/ mi dmigs pa kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa// ga/
226a5(khri brgyad): pa med pa/ shin du snyoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyis mthas btugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas nas gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub
226a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi'o// bzhi
226a7(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can
226a8(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang po skabs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa bral zhing nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med par dpyod pa med pa
226b1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bas pa gtan gnyis pa la sgrub ste gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms gnas
226b2(khri brgyad): shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myongs la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang te dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/
226b3(khri brgyad): dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma
226b4(khri brgyad): yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gtang snyoms dang dran pa yong su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrub te gnas te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
226b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
226b6(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa bzhi'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub
226b7(khri brgyad): par gyur cig/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched sgrubs te gnas
226b8(khri brgyad): pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched
227a1(khri brgyad): bsgrub te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrub nas gan pa
227a2(khri brgyad): ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta
227a3(khri brgyad): ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad do// brgyad gang zhe na gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi
227a4(khri brgyad): gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzug kyi 'du shes rnamal yang
227a5(khri brgyad): dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs gis 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ na mkha' mtha' yas
227a6(khri brgyad): skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de ni rnam pa rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par 'das ste/ rnam shes mtha' ya
227a7(khri brgyad): so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'a
227a8(khri brgyad): te/ ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched sgrub ste gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag 'das nas/
227b1(khri brgyad): 'du shes med 'du shes med mi skye mched sgrubs te gnas pa 'di rnams par mthar pa bdun pa'o// den pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag/
227b2(khri brgyad): 'das na/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa skabs ste gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// /
227b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// dgu gang zhe na/
227b4(khri brgyad): 'dod pa dag las dben la/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa las dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde
227b5(khri brgyad): ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te/ gnas pa dang de rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bral zhing nad yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyun cig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med
227b6(khri brgyad): pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms
227b7(khri brgyad): la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myongs la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang te dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms
227b8(khri brgyad): pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa sgrub te gnas pa dang de bde ba yang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang
228a1(khri brgyad): / nub pas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang mi yin pa gtang snyoms dang / dran pa yongasu dag pas bsam gtan bzhi sgrub te gnas pa dang / de rnam paka
228a2(khri brgyad): cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams la yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ namakha' mtha'
228a3(khri brgyad): yas so snyab nas/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrub te/ gnas pa dang / de rnams pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes
228a4(khri brgyad): ba mtha' yaso snyam na rnam par shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrub te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thab cad du rnam par shes mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med
228a5(khri brgyad): pa'i skye mched sgom de gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las sgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skyer ched las yang dag par 'das
228a6(khri brgyad): nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched bsgrubA te gnas pa dang de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa
228a7(khri brgyad): la bsgrub pa la gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
228a8(khri brgyad): ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ gnas pa yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par
228b1(khri brgyad): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang las yang dag par len pa rnam kyis gnas dang / rnam par smin pa yang
228b2(khri brgyad): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khabs du ma pa/ yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos
228b3(khri brgyad): ba sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim
228b4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / bsapa gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
228b5(khri brgyad): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes
228b6(khri brgyad): dran pa dang / lha'i mig gi 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / zag pa rnams zad pas/ zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba
228b7(khri brgyad): dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba'i tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrub te gnas shing / bdag gi skye ba ni zad/ tshangs par spyod pa ni spyod do//
228b8(khri brgyad): bya ba ni byas so// phyin chad 'di lta bu med do snyam du rab tu shes shing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu shes pa ste/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
229a1(khri brgyad): gapa'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa ched po 'di lta ste/ mi 'jig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe ma/
229a2(khri brgyad): nga yang bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas nas/ kye ba 'di la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa
229a3(khri brgyad): bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang thun par dga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang /
229a4(khri brgyad): par rjesu mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyi khyu mchog rlab po che'i gnas dang
229a5(khri brgyad): bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am su yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par
229a6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gi bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / nga zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ kye ma de la zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdu
229a7(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/ chos dang 'thun pa 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo skab pa'i rgyu
229a8(khri brgyad): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyi khyu mchog brlabs
229b1(khri brgyad): 'ang bdag gi bskor ba bya'o na byab dbang ga dag tu du cang pa'i chos gsung ba dag rten na/ bdun cing pa'i chosu mi 'gyur ba de'i gdu med pa de la rtenan
229b2(khri brgyad): po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sbags so// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ bdud dang / tshangs pa 'am/ su yang rung
229b3(khri brgyad): bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus par gcod par mi 'gyu ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge
229b4(khri brgyad): sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/ chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bar du gcod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de dag sten kyang bar du bcod
229b5(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/
229b6(khri brgyad): chos dang 'thun pa 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu 'di yong dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing bag cha
229b7(khri brgyad): ba med pa thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyi khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrago/ tshangs pa'i
229b8(khri brgyad): 'khor lo dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gi bskor
229b9(khri brgyad): bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang / ngas 'phags nges par 'byin pa'i lam gang dag bstan te/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa des par 'byung ba de dag bsgrubs na/
230a1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal yang dag par mi 'gyur ba de'i gnas med pa de la/ de dag bsgrubs kyang zag pa zad par mi 'gyu ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang /
230a2(khri brgyad): tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam mo// rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi
230a3(khri brgyad): mthong ste/ 'dir rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob pa ste/ gnas kyi khyu mchog brlabs po che'i gnasu dang
230a4(khri brgyad): bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang
230a5(khri brgyad): 'thun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gi bskor bar bya'o// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi byed do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
230a6(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ don so so
230a7(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de yang mi dmig
230a8(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyi rig pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
230b1(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ma pa bcwo brgyad de/ bcwo brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
230b2(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa
230b3(khri brgyad): skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyi rje su bstan nas/ gang gi nub mo phung po lhag med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
230b4(khri brgyad): dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyil ba med dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang
230b5(khri brgyad): sems mnyam par bzhag pa med pa dang / so sor ma brtag pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran
230b6(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes
230b7(khri brgyad): sngon du 'gro zhing / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du
230b8(khri brgyad): 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ong pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye
231a1(khri brgyad): shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags mthogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa'o// de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi 'jug pa ste/
231a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po 'dis
231a3(khri brgyad): ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yi ge'i tshul mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ges 'jus pa'o// de la yi ge'i sgo dang /
231a4(khri brgyad): yi ges 'jug pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni bzod pa nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo
231a5(khri brgyad): yin pa zhes bya ba ni don dam par khyad par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// tsa zhes bya ba ni phyir mchi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
231a6(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no// na zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming dam pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i khri shing gi rgyu
231a7(khri brgyad): dang / rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// nga zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul bar gnas pa yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no//
231a8(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba ni bcings pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// Da zhes bya ba ni khrag khrugs dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// sa zhes bya
231b1(khri brgyad): ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gis lam gyi sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ta zhes bya ba
231b2(khri brgyad): ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ya zhes bya ba ni ci lta ba bzhin du ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// sta zhes bya ba ni kheng/
231b3(khri brgyad): pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid las
231b4(khri brgyad): mi 'da' zhing mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ma zhes bya ba ni nga yir 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro
231b5(khri brgyad): ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// tha zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir thams
231b6(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no// shA zhes bya ba ni dbugs mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// sha zhes
231b7(khri brgyad): bya ba ni zhi gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// kha zhes bya ba ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// ka zhes bya ba
231b8(khri brgyad): ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// d+ha zhes bya ba ni shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yi no// ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos//
232a1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi sgo yon// b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// cha zhes bya ba ni mdag mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams nang
232a2(khri brgyad): kyi sgo yin no// sgra zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yino// hA zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmig pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yino// tas zhes bya ba ni chos thams
232a3(khri brgyad): cad la slob mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// grwa zhes bya ba ni sdug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin// zhes bya ba ni rnam par bsgrubs pa mi/
232a4(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yi no// Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mi dmig pa'i phyir chos tha
232a5(khri brgyad): cad kyi sgo yin no// skra zhes bya ba ni phung po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// dza zhes bya ba ni dga' ba mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// tsa zhes bya ba ni
232a6(khri brgyad): spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad kyi sgo yin no// Da zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dmig pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yin// ha zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i
232a7(khri brgyad): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo yino// de yan chad ni yi ger brjod med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gang gi brjod pa dang / gang gi bstan pa
232a8(khri brgyad): dang gang gi rtogs par byed pa dang / gang gis mthong ba'i ming ci yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni na mkha' dang 'dra bar khong du chud par bya'o//
232b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yig ge bstan pa la 'jug pa la 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa yin/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po/
232b2(khri brgyad): gang la a la sogs pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di shes pa 'di ni sgra gang la yang thogs par ma gyur zhing / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi yang dag par sgrub pa
232b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ skra shes pa la mkhas pa yang thob par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ga la
232b4(khri brgyad): 'jug pa'i phyag rgya a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos la/ thos nas kyang tshul gyis nges par gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyi 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
232b5(khri brgyad): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa de la ni phan yon nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o// nyi shu gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par
232b6(khri brgyad): gyur pa dang / blo gros dang ldan par gyur pa dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par gyur pa dang / bstan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang
232b7(khri brgyad): shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang tshags chung ngus mthong zhing som gnyis za bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
232b8(khri brgyad): gzhan dag las tshigs 'jam po thos nas yang rjesu chags par mi 'gyur la tshig rtsub po thos nas yang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur te/ mtho bar mi 'gyur// dma' bar mi 'gyur
233a1(khri brgyad): gzhing tha mal bar gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /
233a2(khri brgyad): skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rgyu la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos
233a3(khri brgyad): nyid la gnas pa mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po'i mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa dang /
233a4(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lha rna ba shes pa la mkhas dang / sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa la mkhas
233a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas mi yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang / 'gro ba la mkhas pa dang / ldog pa la mkhas pa dang /
233a6(khri brgyad): spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur te/ phan yon nyi shu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a zhes bya ba la sogs pa yi ge la 'jug pa de ni byang chub sems
233a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg po yinano// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o//
233a8(khri brgyad): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong babam po bcu gsub pa'o// / rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
233b1(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/ sanas
233b2(khri brgyad): sar 'phar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa dul spyod pa sa nas sar ji ltar 'phags zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad 'pho ba med
233b3(khri brgyad): pas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang yang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba 'am 'pho ba'am/ nye bor 'pho ba med pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang chos thams cad kyi sa gang yin pa de la rlom
233b4(khri brgyad): sems su mi byed cing mi sems la/ sa yongs su sbyong bar byed de/ sa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongasu
233b5(khri brgyad): spong ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la gnas pas sa yongasu sbyong ba bcu zhes bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/
233b6(khri brgyad): lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu sbyang bar bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi bya ba dang / mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya ba dang / mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i tshul
233b7(khri brgyad): gyi bya ba dngos po yongasu spang po dang / sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir sems can thams can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongasu sbyang ba dang / sbyin par bya ba dang /
233b8(khri brgyad): sbyin pa po dang / len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su spang ba dang / de dag gi rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bstan yongasu spyang
234a1(khri brgyad): #/ ba dang / chos thams cad pi dmigs pa'i chos tshol ba yongasu sbyang ba dang / khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir rgyun mi rang bar mngon par 'byung ba yongasu sgyu
234a2(khri brgyad): ba dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po'i mtshan ma dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongasu sbyangs pa dang / chos kyi dbye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos rnams par
234a3(khri brgyad): 'brel ba yongasu sbyang ba dang / mtshan dang dper byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongasu sbyang ba dang / chos kyi dbye ba mi dmigs
234a4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir chos rnam par 'brel ba yongasu sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yod pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir nga rgyal gyi khengs po nges par gzhod pa yongasu spang ba dang / tshig mi dmigs
234a5(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig yongasu spang ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dang po la gnas pas yongs sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag bya'o// rab 'phye
234a6(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa gnyis pa la gnas pas/ rtag tu chos brgyad yid la bya zhing / de dag la nan tan bya'o// brgyad gang zhe na/
234a7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste tshul khrims yongasu dag pa dang / byas pa bzo zhing byas pa tshor ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba dang / sem
234a8(khri brgyad): can thams cad yongasu pi btang ba dang / snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang / bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing ston pa'i 'du shes kyis srid zhu che ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa
234b1(khri brgyad): rnams brtson pas yongasu tshol ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnyis pa la gnas pas/ chos brgyang po dadag rtag tu/
234b2(khri brgyad): yid la bya zhing de dag la nan tan du bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya'o// lnga gang
234b3(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di lta ste mang du thos pas mchog mi shes shing de la yang yig ge la mngon par zhen par bya ba dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'grel par byed
234b4(khri brgyad): la/ des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongasasu bsngo la/ des kyang rlom semasu byed
234b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / 'khor ba dpag tu med pas yongs su mi skyo zhing / des kyang rloms semasu mi byed pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la gnas shing des kyang
234b6(khri brgyad): rlom semasu mi byed ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga po de dag la gnas par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
234b7(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzhi pa la gnas pas/ chos bcu yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya shing de yongasu spang bar mi bya'o// bcu
234b8(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgon pa la gnas pa dang / yongasu mi gtang ba dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang mchog shes pa dang / sbyang ba'i yon tan dang / yo byad snyang
235a1(khri brgyad): ba mi btang ba dang / slab pa yongasu pa btang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa dang /
235a2(khri brgyad): bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang ba dang / sems mi 'dre ba dang / dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
235a3(khri brgyad): sa bzhi la gnas pa'i chos bcu po de dag yongasu btang ba bar mi bya zhing yang dag par blangs te gnas par mi bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
235a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu yongasu spang bar bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang bar bya zhing
235a5(khri brgyad): dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / 'dris par byed pa yongasu spangs par bya ba dang / khyim pa la ser sna byed pa yongasu spangs par bya ba dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs
235a6(khri brgyad): spang bar bya ba dang / gnod sems yongasu spang bar nga bya ba dang / bdag la stod pa yongasu spang bar bya ba bzhin/ gzhan la smod pa yongasu spang bar bya ba dang / mi
235a7(khri brgyad): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongasu spang bar bya ba dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa yongasu spang bar bya ba dang / phyin ci log yongasu spang bar
235a8(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / the tshom yongasu spang bar bya 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang nyi mug gi bag chags yongasu spang bar bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
235b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos bcu po de dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos drug pa la gnas
235b2(khri brgyad): pas chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// chos gzhan yang chos drug yongasu spangs
235b3(khri brgyad): bar bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems yongasu spang bar bya dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongasu spang bar bya ba dang / yongasu yid chad pa'i sems yongasu
235b4(khri brgyad): spang bar bya ba dang / slong ba mthong na sems zhum par mi bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad yongasu btang nas yid mi bya bar mi bya ba dang / slong bskrad par mi bya ba de/
235b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos drug pa la gnas pas chos drug po 'di dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
235b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu mi bya'o// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya ba dang / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog
235b7(khri brgyad): tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / chang par 'dzin par bya dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang / rgyur lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs la
235b8(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa dang / phung po la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams la mngon par zhen pa dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang /
236a1(khri brgyad): khams gsum la lhag par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la chags pa dang / sangs rgyas su lta brten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / cho su lta ba rten cing mngon
236a2(khri brgyad): par zhen pa dang / dge 'dun du lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / tshul khrim su lta ba la rten cing mngon par zhen pa dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes byas bgyid lug pa
236a3(khri brgyad): dang / stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu po dag mi bya'o// sa bdun la gnas pa de
236a4(khri brgyad): chos nyi shu yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang rang bzhin gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang /
236a5(khri brgyad): chos kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa dang / chos rnams kyis bar du chos
236a6(khri brgyad): rnams kyis stong pa dang / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig gi rnam pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
236a7(khri brgyad): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa yang ba
236a8(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnab par shes pas stong pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yid kyi rnam
236b1(khri brgyad): par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg
236b2(khri brgyad): pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du the ba chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg
236b3(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir
236b4(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
236b5(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi bar
236b6(khri brgyad): du gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/
236b7(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'i rang bzhin gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshur bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa yang
236b8(khri brgyad): ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa dang / yid
237a1(khri brgyad): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang
237a2(khri brgyad): ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma dang / smig sgyu dang /
237a3(khri brgyad): brag cha dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i gnas yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang gnas
237a4(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gnas pa'am mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir
237a5(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di ltar rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// sgyu ma dang sdig sgyu dang / brag cha dang / mig g.yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i gnas pa 'am
237a6(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ba'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / smig sgra'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / brag cha'i rang bzhin ni/ brag cha'i rang
237a7(khri brgyad): bzhin gyi stong pa dang / mig g.yor gyi rang bzhin ni mig g.yor gyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin
237a8(khri brgyad): gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa
237b1(khri brgyad): / chen po de yang gnas pa yang ba yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshul khribs kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang //
237b2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab
237b3(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin gnas pa 'ang/
237b4(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
237b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'ang/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
237b6(khri brgyad): rang bzhin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro//
237b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nang stong pa nyid gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin
237b8(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// /
238a1(khri brgyad): @rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin pa gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
238a2(khri brgyad): ni gnas pa ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
238a3(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin stong pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar/
238a4(khri brgyad): du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yi mi
238a5(khri brgyad): yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang
238a6(khri brgyad): bzhin ni gnas pa'ang mi gnas pa yang ba yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyi
238a7(khri brgyad): stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor
238a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
238b1(khri brgyad): bar gyi rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa yang ma yin pa gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lam ni lam gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di
238b2(khri brgyad): lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi
238b3(khri brgyad): kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa ma yin no//
238b4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
238b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
238b6(khri brgyad): pa 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no//
238b7(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi
238b8(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang
239a1(khri brgyad): bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi/
239a2(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi
239a3(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab
239a4(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
239a5(khri brgyad): chen po'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i 'i'i phyir ro// /
239a6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang // // de bzhin
239a7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin stong pa dang / rangab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa yang po yin ni
239a8(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid byur du gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rang byang chub ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas
239b1(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs
239b2(khri brgyad): pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / rang
239b3(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
239b4(khri brgyad): bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ra bzhin gyi stong pa dang / rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub
239b5(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// /
239b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/
239b7(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
239b8(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
240a1(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin stong pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyiraro// /
240a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ming gi gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin//
240a3(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ brda' dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa'i gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor
240a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ming gi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa
240a5(khri brgyad): ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma'i rang bzhin dang / brda'i rang bzhin dang gdags pa'i rang bzhin gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i
240a6(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gi rang bzhin ni gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / mtshan mtshan ma'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / brda'i rang bzhin ni brda'i rang bzhin
240a7(khri brgyad): gyi stong pa dang / tha snyad kyi rang bzhin ni tha snyad kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rab
240a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor skye ba med pa ni gnas pa yang yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang mi gnas pa pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang
240b1(khri brgyad): ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa/
240b2(khri brgyad): ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
240b3(khri brgyad): zhe na/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gnas pa ma yin pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
240b4(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / 'gag
240b5(khri brgyad): ba med pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa'i
240b6(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa de ni skyod du med pa'i tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul gyis gang du gnas par 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du/
240b7(khri brgyad): mngon sum du bya ba dang / smon pa med pa shes pa dang / 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rtse zhing snying rje ba dang / sems
240b8(khri brgyad): can de dag la snying rtse zhing snying rje ba dang / sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba dang / chos thas cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta zhing de la yang mngon par zhen par
241a1(khri brgyad): mi bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs shing de rloms sems su pi bya ba dang / mi skye bar bzod pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / tshul cig/
241a2(khri brgyad): snyan pa dang / chos thams cad la rtog pa yang dag par bzhom pa dang / lta ba bzlog pa dang / zhi gnas nges par sems dpa' dang / lhag mthong la khar
241a3(khri brgyad): pa'i sa dang / sems dul ba dang / sems zhi ba dang / shes pa thogs pa med pa dang / rje su chags pa'i sa ma yin pa dang / zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba dang /
241a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu po de dag yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
241a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas/ chos bzhi yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sem
241a6(khri brgyad): la 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi ci ltar mthong ba de dag kyang yongasu bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas la bsnyen
241a7(khri brgyad): bkur bya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag par ci blta ba ste/ rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
241a8(khri brgyad): / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad la gnas pas chos bzhi yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhig
241b1(khri brgyad): zhe na/ dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu bsgrub pa dag par bya ba dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rgyun mi chad par
241b2(khri brgyad): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasasu 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su bsgrub cing bsam
241b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du srid pa nye bar len pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi po de dag yongasasu rdzogs par
241b4(khri brgyad): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis rdzogs par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe
241b5(khri brgyad): na/ 'di lta ste/ smon lam mtha' yas pa yongasu bzung ba ste/ de smon lam ji lta bu 'debs pa de lta de lta bur grub par gyur pa dang / lha dang klu dang /
241b6(khri brgyad): gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i klung khod
241b7(khri brgyad): du chud po dang / mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshe rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum
241b8(khri brgyad): tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par byang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
242a1(khri brgyad): yon tan thams cad yongs rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dgu pa la gnas/
242a2(khri brgyad): pas/ chos bcu gnyis po de dag yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni/ de bzhin gsheg
242a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid ces bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
242a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa dang po la gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu sbyong bar bgyid pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam
242a5(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yang dag par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub
242a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs srung ba yin no// de la sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongasu sbyong ba gang zhe na/
242a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gi tshad med pa bzhi pa'o// byabs pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang stobs mngon par sgrub pa gang
242a8(khri brgyad): yin pa ste/ de ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yongasu sbyang ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongasu sbyang ba ga
242b1(khri brgyad): gang she na/ sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog par med par sbyin pa byin pa ste/ de ni stong pa yongasu spongs pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sem
242b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa yongasu sbyong ba gang zhe na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni/ gang dag nam
242b3(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par 'dzud cing 'jog la rab tu bgod par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bstan pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / srid tu
242b4(khri brgyad): byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bstan pa yongasu rdzogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
242b5(khri brgyad): chen po'i chos tshol ba yongs spyod ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang dang ldan pa'i sems kyi chos tshol bar byed la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
242b6(khri brgyad): yang mi ltung ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos tshol ba yongasasu rdzogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
242b7(khri brgyad): po'i rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'byung ba yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'dre ba med par mngon par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang
242b8(khri brgyad): rab tu 'byung la/ su yang de'i bar chang byed par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'phru
243a1(khri brgyad): pa yongasu spyang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongs sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku bathong
243a2(khri brgyad): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du nam kyang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang / bral bar ma 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
243a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa yongasu sbyong ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par 'brel ba yongasu spyang ba zhe na/
243a4(khri brgyad): khyong tshab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i chas rnam par 'gral ba yangs sa spang ba zhe ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum
243a5(khri brgyad): sum du bzhugs kyang rung / mya ngan las 'das kyang rung / sems can rnams la chos ston to// tshangs par spyod pa/ thogs mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha bar dge ba
243a6(khri brgyad): don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongasu rdzogs pa yongasasu dag pa/ yongasu byang ba 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i
243a7(khri brgyad): sde dang / tshig su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / slad du byung ba'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /
243a8(khri brgyad): gtan la dbab pa'i sde bstan pa'i sde yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnams par 'brel ba yongasu sbyong ba yin no//
243b1(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyi kheng pa nges par bzhom pa yongasu sbyong ba gang zhe na/ nga rgyal gyi khengs pa bzhom pa gang gis nam kyang /
243b2(khri brgyad): rigs dma' ba rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal gyi khengs pa nges par bzhom pa yongasu sbyang ba yin no// de la
243b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongasu sbyong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
243b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i tshig yongasu sbyang ba yin no// rab 'byor bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pas yongasu spang bar
243b5(khri brgyad): bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongasu spong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa te/ de ni
243b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig yong su spang ba yin no// rab 'byor bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la
243b7(khri brgyad): gnas pas yongs su spyad byar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sad
243b8(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sems dang / gzhan yang chal pa'i tshul khrim su byed pa/ byang chub la bar chad byed pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag yid la mi byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
244a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongasu dag yongasu dag pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa bzo/
244a2(khri brgyad): zhing / byas pa tshor ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ chung ngu zhig byas na yang 'khor ba'i
244a3(khri brgyad): mtha'i bar du chud mi zon na/ chen po lta ci smos te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa bzo zhing / byas pa tshor ba yin no// de la bya
244a4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stobs la gnas pa gang zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems med pa
244a5(khri brgyad): ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing
244a6(khri brgyad): dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa gsum po dag la sems can yongasu smin par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
244a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad
244a8(khri brgyad): yongasu mi btong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad yongasu skyob pas ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongasu mi bta
244b1(khri brgyad): pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du 'gro ba gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems/
244b2(khri brgyad): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang bdag bskal pa chen po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba dag
244b3(khri brgyad): tu 'dug la/ sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lam bzhag gi bar du der bcad pa dang / bshags pa dang / brdung ba dang / btso ba dang / bsreg pa dag kyang
244b4(khri brgyad): nyamasu myong bar bya'o snyam te/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi phyir mngon par spro zhing yongasu mi skyo ba'i bar du ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
244b5(khri brgyad): snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma rnams la dad pas gus shing srid zhu che ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma rnam
244b6(khri brgyad): la ston pa'i 'du shes 'jog pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la dad pas gus shing srid zhu che ba zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
244b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ las gzhan mi
244b8(khri brgyad): byed par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongasu tshol ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa rnams brtson pas tshol ba zhes bya'o//
245a1(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
245a2(khri brgyad): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ phyogs bcu 'khor yug gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag tu gang ci gsungs pa de thams cad bzung bar bya'o// snyam du mchog mi
245a3(khri brgyad): shes pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas chog mi shes pa yin// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
245a4(khri brgyad): po zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'brel bar byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston kyang / chos kyi sbyin pa'i dge
245a5(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba des tha na byang chub sems dpa' la yang re ba mi byed pa te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sprin po rnam par
245a6(khri brgyad): 'brel bar byed pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bskyed cing yongasu bsngo ba gang zhe na
245a7(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed pa/ bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing yongasu dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu sgrub ste/
245a8(khri brgyad): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongasu bsngo ba yin no// de la byang chub sems
245b1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor dpag tu med pas mi skyo ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang dag gis nye bar brtan na//
245b2(khri brgyad): sems can rnams kyang yongasasu smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu dag par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad
245b3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par gyur gyi bar du nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor dpag tu med pas
245b4(khri brgyad): yongs su mi skyo ba yin no// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
245b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
245b6(khri brgyad): po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongasu ma btang ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sad rgyu kyi sa las shin du 'da' ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
245b7(khri brgyad): chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongasu mi btang ba yino// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
245b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos byang chub kyang mi 'dod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
246a1(khri brgyad): chen po'i mchog shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems
246a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog shes yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i spangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad skud pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos
246a3(khri brgyad): zab mo dag la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad snang ba mi btang ba yin
246a4(khri brgyad): no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsrung ba yongasu mi btang ba gang zhe na/ gang la bslab po thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sem
246a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongasu mi btang ba gang zhe na/
246a6(khri brgyad): 'dod pa la sems skyed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la spad pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sem
246a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems skyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang chos thams cad la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
246a8(khri brgyad): chen po'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtang
246b1(khri brgyad): pa gang zhe na/ nang dang phyi rol gyi chos rnams 'dzin par mi byed pa de gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang /
246b2(khri brgyad): ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba gang zhe na/ gang rnam par shes pa la gnas pa rnams de'i sems mi sbyong ba ste/ de ni
246b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dre ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba gang zhe na/
246b4(khri brgyad): dngos po thams cad ni yid la mi byed pa gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba yino// de la byang chub
246b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang 'dris par byed pa yongasu spong ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus
246b6(khri brgyad): te skyes pa dang / mgo bregs shing dur smrig gyon pa dang / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim dang 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang ba yin no// /
246b7(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang ba gang zhe na/ dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / se gol rtog pa srid
246b8(khri brgyad): srid du yang lhan cig mi gnas shing / de dag med na yang yongasu mi mchad par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong
247a1(khri brgyad): ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong dang / 'dris par byed pa yongs
247a2(khri brgyad): spang ba gang zhe na/ dge slong dang dge slong ma rnams dang / se gol rtog pa srid du yang lhan cig mi gnas shing / de dag med na yang yongasu yi 'chad par mi 'gyur ba gang yin
247a3(khri brgyad): ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang 'dris par byed pa yongasu spang bar yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
247a4(khri brgyad): po'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya'o ste/ bdag
247a5(khri brgyad): gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byed sbyar bar byas nas/ sems can 'di dag ni rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur pa yin gyis/ 'di la bdag
