247a6(khri brgyad): gi ser sna'i sems skyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khyim la ser sna byed pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la
247a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongasu spang bar bya ba ci lta bu zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i
247a8(khri brgyad): gnas gang du gnas na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi gleng ldeng bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
247b1(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas par mi bya ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongasu
247b2(khri brgyad): spang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnod sems yongasu spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ gang gnod sems dang / rnam par 'che ba'i
247b3(khri brgyad): sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / 'thab pa'i sems dang / brtsod pa'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongasu
247b4(khri brgyad): spang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la stod pa yongasu spang ba gang zhe na/ gang nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba
247b5(khri brgyad): ste/ 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag la stod pa yongasu spang ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la
247b6(khri brgyad): smod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol gyi chos yang dag par rjes mi mthong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan la smod pa yongasu spang
247b7(khri brgyad): ba yino// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongasu spang ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di dag ni bde 'gro la
247b8(khri brgyad): yang bar du bcod par byed na/ 'phags pa'i lam lta ci smos spros pa ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
248a1(khri brgyad): yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongasu spong bar byed pa ji lta bu/
248a2(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos ci yang dag par rje su mi mthong na/ gang gi lta bar rlom sems pa'i lhag pa lta ga la yod ces na/ de ltar lhag pa'i nga rgyal spang
248a3(khri brgyad): bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci ltar 'khengs pa yongasu spang bar bya zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la de'i khengs pa yongasu spang bar
248a4(khri brgyad): bya zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la de'i khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
248a5(khri brgyad): pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongasu spang bar bya ba ci lta bu zhe na/ dngos po rnams
248a6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
248a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gi bag chags yongasu spang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / ga
248a8(khri brgyad): mug rnams kyis dngos po yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
248b1(khri brgyad): gti mug gi bag chags yong su spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos drug la chos drug yongasu rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di
248b2(khri brgyad): lta ste pha rol du phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
248b3(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sangs rgyas
248b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas nas shes bya'i rgya mtsho rnam pa lnga'i pha rol tu
248b5(khri brgyad): phyin par gyur to// phyin to// phyin par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs dang / da ltar 'byung ba dang / brjod du med pa dang /
248b6(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas pa te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol du phyin pa drug po rnams yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
248b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ci ltar nyan thos kyis sems yongasu spang bar bya ste/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rang sangs rgyas kyis sems
248b8(khri brgyad): yongasu spong bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam yin pa'i phyir ro// yong su yid chad pa'i sems yongasu spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
249a1(khri brgyad): 'di ltar de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro// spong ba mthong na sems zhum par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na//
249a2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar de ni byang gi lam ma yin pa'i phyir ro// dngos po thams cad yongasu btang nas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni/ byang chub kyi lam ma
249a3(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyiraro/ sems dang po skyed phyin chad rtag tu sbyin pa byin par bya zhing / sems bsog tu mi bya ba ste/ chos drug po de dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// de la byang chub
249a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang bdog tu 'dzin par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar bdag brtan med pa'i phyir ro// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang /
249a5(khri brgyad): gang zag tu 'dzin pa la nga de bzhin du sbyor ba te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med pa'i phyir ro// chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro// de la byang
249a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar brtag par 'dzin par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos gang mi skye ba de rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur phyir ro// de la byang chub sems
249a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang rgyur lta bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des lta ba yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa'
249a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar ming dang gzugs la yang mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po de mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang
249b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang / gzugs la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams la mngon
249b2(khri brgyad): par zhen par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos 'di dag rang bzhin gyi med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la mngon par zhen
249b3(khri brgyad): par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
249b4(khri brgyad): de rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar yang khams gsuM
249b5(khri brgyad): la lhag par zhen par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
249b6(khri brgyad): khams gsum la lhag par zhen par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci ltar khams gsum la chags par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir
249b7(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kham gsum la chags par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa
249b8(khri brgyad): chen pos ji ltar yang sangs rgyas su lta ba la brtan par mi bya'o// 'di ltar sangs rgyas su blta ba la brten pas/ sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems
249b9(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/
250a1(khri brgyad): @#dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas su lta blta brten par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yongasu blta ba
250a2(khri brgyad): la brten par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos su lta ba la rten pas chos mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chosu
250a3(khri brgyad): lta ba la rten par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang dge 'dun du lta ba la brten par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge
250a4(khri brgyad): 'dun du lta ba la brten par dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun du lta ba lta brten par mi bya'o// de la
250a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang tshul khribs su lta ba la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshul khrim su lta ba la rten pa
250a6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims yongasu dag par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrimasu lta ba mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de la byang chub
250a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang chos rnams stong ngo zhes bya ba bgyid lug par mi bya ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong gi/ tshe/
250a8(khri brgyad): nyid kyi stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams zhes bya bas snyid lug par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
250b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba mi bya ba ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/
250b2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid rtogs par bya'o// de la byang chub
250b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa'i mngon sum du bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o// de lta byang chub sems dpa' sems
250b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
250b5(khri brgyad): po'i 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongasasu rdzogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
250b6(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad la snying rtse zhing snying rje ba yongasu rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po thob pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
250b7(khri brgyad): ji ltar sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can gyi zhing yong su dag pa'i phyir ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos
250b8(khri brgyad): thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du blta ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la len pa med pa dang / bri ba med pa'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
251a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
251a2(khri brgyad): chen po'i skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste/ de ni mi skye bar bzod
251a3(khri brgyad): pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang ming dang gzugs kyi mi skye ba shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
251a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul cig tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos kun tu sbyong ba med pa nyid de/
251a5(khri brgyad): de ni tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bzhom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa'o// /
251a6(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi blta ba thams cad bzlog pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
251a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa gang zhe na/ gang bag chags dang / 'tsham sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dor ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
251a8(khri brgyad): chen po'i zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shes so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sem
251b1(khri brgyad): dul ba gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhi ba gang zhe na/ gang dbang po drug po
251b2(khri brgyad): dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa thogs pa med pa gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o// de la byang chub
251b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjesu chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug la btang snyom su 'jug pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
251b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du bgrod par 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang der lung bstan pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
251b5(khri brgyad): chen po'i sems can thams cad sems dang sems de las byung ba rnams shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pa rnam par
251b6(khri brgyad): rtse ba gang zhes na/ sangs rgyas lta ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa gang dag gi rnam par brtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du
251b7(khri brgyad): shes kyang mi skyed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas kyang ma g.yos
251b8(khri brgyad): la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang zhing / de sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed pa'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
252a1(khri brgyad): kyi dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas sems can yongasu smin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad yongs su
252a2(khri brgyad): gtong zhing / des rlom sems su yang mi byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya ba gang zhe na/ se
252a3(khri brgyad): can thams cad la phan bdags pa'i phyir gang chos la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas sku la yang dag
252a4(khri brgyad): pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'o// / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang
252a5(khri brgyad): mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa gang zhe na/ mchog ma yin pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu
252a6(khri brgyad): rdzogs par shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa bya ba gang zhe na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sems
252a7(khri brgyad): can gyi sems yong su dag par byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
252a8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na/ bya ba thams cad byed pa de'i sems chos gang la 'jug pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
252b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pa'i rgyun pi chad par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhen/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las byung chuba'i ting 'di
252b2(khri brgyad): to// de la ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasasu 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus
252b3(khri brgyad): yongasu sgrub ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji lta bur sems can yongasu smin par 'gyur ba de lta de bu'i bsam bzhin du yongs
252b4(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du srid pa nye bar len ce na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yong su smin par
252b5(khri brgyad): bya ba'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na/
252b6(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol du phyin pa drug po dag yongasu rdzogs par byas pas/ smon lam ji lta ji lta bu 'debs pa de
252b7(khri brgyad): lha de lta bu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / mkha
252b8(khri brgyad): lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de la bya
253a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spobs pa'i khongasu chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so sor yang yang dag par/
253a2(khri brgyad): rig pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
253a3(khri brgyad): tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpal
253a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs chen po dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa
253a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal rigs bzhi'i shing sa la chen po lta bu dag dang / bram
253a6(khri brgyad): ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs rigs phun sum tshogs pa yino// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
253a7(khri brgyad): chen po'i rig phun sum chog pa gang zhe na/ rigs gang las sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge byung bar gyur pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa
253a8(khri brgyad): chen po'i rus phun suM tshogs pa yi no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sem can rnams byang chub tu bko/
253b1(khri brgyad): nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor nyid dang ldan pas ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yino// de la byang chub sems dpa'
253b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ skye ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang rnam pa drug tu
253b3(khri brgyad): g.yo bar 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yin// de la byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po'i mngon pa 'byung
253b4(khri brgyad): ba phun sum chog pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems cad bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma dag dang khyim nas rab tu byung zhing mngon par 'byung ba dang /
253b5(khri brgyad): sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag la nges par 'byung ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun su chog pa yi no// de la
253b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun suM tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub shing gi rtsa ba ni gser las grub pa/ sdong po bai dUr+yal
253b7(khri brgyad): grub ga/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang 'dab pa rnams ni rin po che sna bdun las grub yin la/ ya wa ga dang lo ba dang / 'dab ma rnams ni rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yin la
253b8(khri brgyad): yan lag dang / 'dab ma de dag gi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham mtha' yas pa'i bar dag tu snang bas khyab par byas pa ste/ de ni byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa'
254a1(khri brgyad): #gachen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yino// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa phun
254a2(khri brgyad): sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongasu smin par byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa ste/ de ni byang chub sem
254a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa phun suM tshogs pa yi no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu la gnas pa
254a4(khri brgyad): ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ce bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po de dag yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang sa
254a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar dag yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / bag chag dang 'tshams sbyor ba dang / nyon
254a6(khri brgyad): sod pa thab cad spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa chen po sa bcu lagan
254a7(khri brgyad): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu po dag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems/
254a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad la spyad pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su bcu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab ga/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa
254b1(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pa ni/ dkar po rnams par mthong ba'i sa la yang dag par 'da' zhing / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sa
254b2(khri brgyad): dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrab pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sem
254b3(khri brgyad): dpa'i sa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po ni sa dgu po 'di dag las 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gan par 'gyur ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni
254b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dang sem dpa' chen po'i sa bcu yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
254b5(khri brgyad): ba yino// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sa yongasu sbyangs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// // rab 'byor
254b6(khri brgyad): khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer na/ 'ams gsum nges par 'byung bar gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gal ba der
254b7(khri brgyad): gnas par 'gyur te/ de yang gnyisu med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni
254b8(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te// thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid cig pa'o//

255a1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la ni nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba med pa'i
255a2(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la/ nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid
255a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / spong ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang /
255a4(khri brgyad): 'gog pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// de ci'i
255a5(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa'i phyiraro// 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyararo// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang
255a6(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni gzug kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod zad do// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /
255a7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams
255a8(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams nges par
255b1(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i byara'o// de tso'i phyir shen/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong / nor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
255b2(khri brgyad): dang rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi stong pa nyid la nges
255b3(khri brgyad): bar 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi stong pa
255b4(khri brgyad): nyid la nges par 'byung du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / sgra dang
255b5(khri brgyad): dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
255b6(khri brgyad): dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te regs pa las byung ba'i
255b7(khri brgyad): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges
255b8(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sbar te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
256a1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// de ci'i
256a2(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ mig ni mig gi stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las 'byung ba'i tshor ba dag kyang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la byung
256a3(khri brgyad): ba'i tshor bas stong pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnam nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa yin pa de ni rmi laM la nges par 'byung du zada'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid
256a4(khri brgyad): ba'i chos rnam las nges par 'byung ba'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang // mig g.yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du
256a5(khri brgyad): zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni khams gsu nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur
256a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / rab 'byor de bzhin du sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang / smig rgyu dang brag cha dang / mig g.yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni kham gsuM nas nges par 'byung
256a7(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste rmi la gyi rang bzhin ni rmi lam rang bzhin gyi stong
256a8(khri brgyad): ba dang / sgyu ba'i rang bzhin ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / smig rgyu ni smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / khrag cha ni brag cha'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / mig yor gyi rang bzhin ni mig long
256b1(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos nas la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin 'di ni sbyin ni
256b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la dri bar 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi
256b3(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bas gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la dre bar 'byung /
256b4(khri brgyad): par 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhino// khams gsuM nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
256b5(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
256b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnyis pa mi 'gyur ba
256b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brgya
256b8(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas gtan kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sha rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni she rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor/
257a1(khri brgyad): macan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa ni/ nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor/
257a2(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
257a3(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
257a4(khri brgyad): gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gi stong pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
257a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med rlos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa
257a6(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam nges par 'byung ba 'dod du dzad// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ kham+ba gsuM nas nges par
257a7(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis rang bzhin ni
257a8(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnaMs kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnaMs la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par
257b1(khri brgyad): spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la nges par 'byung ba 'dod zadado//
257b2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar laM gyi bar gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni kham gsuM nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gan par
257b3(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar laM gyi bar gyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnaMs la nges par
257b4(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la nges
257b5(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi
257b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i
257b7(khri brgyad): phyir/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa nges par 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan
257b8(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i chos rnam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pa yA dag par rdzog
258a1(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bani
258a2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ kham
258a3(khri brgyad): gsum nas nges par 'byung ba mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin
258a4(khri brgyad): ni dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi stong / byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang ba
258a5(khri brgyad): gyi stong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang
258a6(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par byang bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/
258a7(khri brgyad): lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
258a8(khri brgyad): nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de//
258b1(khri brgyad): khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi
258b2(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir// de ci'i
258b3(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bru bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bru bu dang / phyir mi
258b4(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
258b5(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ ming la nges par 'byung ba 'dod du zad do// rab
258b6(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma dang brda dang tha snyad dang / gdag pa la de bar 'byung bar 'dod du zad//
258b7(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsu nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa mi 'gyur ba'i phyiro//
258b8(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la de bar 'byung bar
259a1(khri brgyad): 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la nges par 'byung ba gang yin
259a2(khri brgyad): pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byad med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
259a3(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ khams gsu nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi
259a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar na/
259a5(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur te/ theg pa 'di ni bskyod du med pa yin no//
259a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// / bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du// theg pa de dag
259a7(khri brgyad): tu gnas par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ theg pa de gang tu gnas par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro//
259a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'on kyang theg pa de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyi gnas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid gnas pa yang ma yin no// /
259b1(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang
259b2(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
259b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma
259b4(khri brgyad): yin zhing yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang dadrung / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin
259b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi rang bzhin ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni/ yang dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i
259b6(khri brgyad): dbyings kyi rang bzhin bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyi pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ na mkha'i khams ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma
259b7(khri brgyad): yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ spong ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chag dang bral gi
259b8(khri brgyad): dbying dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nam pa'i
260a1(khri brgyad): khams kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang
260a2(khri brgyad): bzhin dang 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar na mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni na mkha'i khams
260a3(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni 'dod chags pa
260a4(khri brgyad): bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni/ 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzug
260a5(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'a
260a6(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no//
260a7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi ga
260a8(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa
260b1(khri brgyad): bar du rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ba yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// yid kyi stong
260b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi/
260b3(khri brgyad): gi rang bzhin gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa yang yin pa dang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas bla ya ma yin pa'i phyiraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi stong pa dang / yid kyi bar du yid
260b4(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid na gnas pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yino// chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas
260b5(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi theg pa de su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer
260b6(khri brgyad): ba ni theg pa de su yang nges par 'byung ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste theg pa gang yin pa de dang / gang nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gi nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
260b7(khri brgyad): gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa la chos gang zhig chos gang gi nges
260b8(khri brgyad): par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmig pa dang / sem can dang srog dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / shi pa po dang / mthong
261a1(khri brgyad): po mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa
261a2(khri brgyad): dpyid mi dmigs/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa de
261a3(khri brgyad): bzhin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
261a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du mi dmig/
261a5(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mi dmigs/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa rig pa bzhi dang /
261a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mi dmigs/ de bzhin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du bzhugs pa mi dmigs/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
261a7(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs/
261a8(khri brgyad): shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa
261b1(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
261b2(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa mi dmigs/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i mngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi ma'i mtha' dang /
261b3(khri brgyad): da ltar byung ba mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang gnas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro
261b4(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir// gang dmig su med pa thams cad mi dmigs/ chos kyi dbyings med pas mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings dmig
261b5(khri brgyad): su med pas chos kyi dbyings mi dmig so// skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa mi dmig su med pa
261b6(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmig so// de bzhin nyid dmig su med pas de bzhin nyid mi dmig so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigasu med pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigaso/
261b7(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mig su med pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pad+madamig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
261b8(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmig su med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dmig su med pa/
262a1(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid mi dmig so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmig su med pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
262a2(khri brgyad): dmig su med pas/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmig so// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
262a3(khri brgyad): dang / lam dmig su med pas lam mi dmig so// de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
262a4(khri brgyad): brgyang dmig su med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dmig su med do rgyun tu zhugs pa dmig su med pas rgyun du zhugs pa dmigasu med do// lan cig myong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong
262a5(khri brgyad): ba dang / dgra bcom pa dmig su med pas/ dgra bcom pa mi dmig so// rang sangs rgyas dmigasu med pas/ rang sangs rgyas dmig so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du
262a6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigaso// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra/
262a7(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid mi dmigasu med pas/ sangs rgyas nyid mi dmig so// de bzhin du dmigasu med pas rab tu dga' ba'i sa mi dmigs
262a8(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dmig su med pas/ dri ma med pa dang / 'od 'phro can dang / shin du spang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / les
262b1(khri brgyad): pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin gyi mi dmig so gzhan sa dmigasu med pas sa bcu mi dmigs te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sa dang po dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang /
262b2(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub
262b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyis dang po mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyis dang po mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
262b4(khri brgyad): phyir stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi sa bcu'i bar du mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
262b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyi sems can yong su smin par byed pa mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
262b6(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
262b7(khri brgyad): kyis mig snga mi dmig so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi
262b8(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ theg pa chen po nges
263a1(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcwo brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi 'di skad
263a2(khri brgyad): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/ lha dang mi dang lha mi yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i spang
263a3(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das theg pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ nam mkha' ni sems can dpag tu ma mchis
263a4(khri brgyad): grangs tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyis go 'byed pa
263a5(khri brgyad): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po lag so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba
263a6(khri brgyad): 'am/ gnas pa mi dmigs so// sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ste dper bgyin
263a7(khri brgyad): nam mkha' la ni 'ong ba mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi dmigs/ gnas pa mi dmig so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen pa chen po 'di yang 'ong ba mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi
263a8(khri brgyad): dmigs gnas pa mi dmigs pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ na mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
263b1(khri brgyad): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus mi dmigs lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das
263b2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste theg pa chen po 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
263b3(khri brgyad): te/ de de bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khribs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
263b4(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / rab 'byor de ni byang chub
263b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste dper na/
263b6(khri brgyad): gzung gi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' ltar chags pa med par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
263b7(khri brgyad): gyi bar dag te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen pa'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
263b8(khri brgyad): bo ni/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//
264a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
264a2(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
264a3(khri brgyad): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
264a4(khri brgyad): chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyi 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges
264a5(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa la/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
264a6(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i khams so// rab 'byor de la gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang /
264a7(khri brgyad): yang dag pa dang bden pa dang / ci lta bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ dngos po med pa 'di yin na ni theg pa chen po
264a8(khri brgyad): 'di lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni rtags
264b1(khri brgyad): pa rnam par bsgrub pa tshig gi bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi dag mi rgan zhing zer zug pa yin la/ 'gyur ba'i chos can de/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa yod pa yin pas/
264b2(khri brgyad): de'i phyir theg pa chen pos/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan cing nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams
264b3(khri brgyad): kyi de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / ther zug
264b4(khri brgyad): dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la// dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'di lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par
264b5(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs kyi khams ni rtags pa rnams sgrub pa'i tshig gi bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la
264b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i chos can de/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi
264b7(khri brgyad): gnan nas nges par 'byung bar gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i khams de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma
264b8(khri brgyad): log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos
265a1(khri brgyad): yo yi ma pan po ngas kyang shA nga / mi dngas pazhin du cas pa'i 'di rten kyis kyi gnan spangs par 'byung
265a2(khri brgyad): zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs med pa'i khams ni rtags pa rnam par bsgrub pa'i tshig gi bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing thor zug ma yin la/
265a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi
265a4(khri brgyad): gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa
265a5(khri brgyad): dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ de dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / mi dang /
265a6(khri brgyad): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs rtag pa/ rnam par bsgrub pa'i tshig gi bstan
265a7(khri brgyad): pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag cing zer zug ma yin/ 'gyur ba'i chos can de/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'od lha dang / mi dang /
265a8(khri brgyad): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
265b1(khri brgyad): shes pa de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan pa yin pa dang / phyin cim log pa dang / de khon dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rgag pa dang /
265b2(khri brgyad): brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ de dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
265b3(khri brgyad): rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gis phyir rnam par shes pa ni tags pa rnam par bsgrub pa'i tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad
265b4(khri brgyad): mi rtag mi rten zhing ther zug ma yin pa 'gyur ba'i chos can de/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du
265b5(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ gal te mig dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang
265b6(khri brgyad): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
265b7(khri brgyad): byung ba'i tshor ba de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa
265b8(khri brgyad): dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ de dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
266a1(khri brgyad): rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gis phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rtag pa nas bsgrub pa'i
266a2(khri brgyad): tshig kyis brtan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtan zhing ther zug pa yin la/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang
266a3(khri brgyad): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / na mkha' dang /
266a4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang /
266a5(khri brgyad): len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bgyi
266a6(khri brgyad): dang / rtag pa dang / rten pa dang / ther zug pa dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pa dngos po med pa yin de ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lhan dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
266a7(khri brgyad): rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhig/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rga shi ni tags pa rnam sgrub pa'i tshig brtan pa ste/ mi rtag mi rten zhing ther zug ma yin pa la
266a8(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i chos can de/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa pa yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lho dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ril gyi gnan nas nges par
266b1(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin nyid dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / pi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges
266b2(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin du dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
266b3(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
266b4(khri brgyad): dang / chos skon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lnga dang mi
266b5(khri brgyad): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir ma nor ba dang / de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhi
266b6(khri brgyad): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang
266b7(khri brgyad): po med cing / dngos yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lho ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar gyur ro// rab
266b8(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas
267a1(khri brgyad): nges par 'byeng ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
267a2(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de de bzhin du gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
267a3(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha
267a4(khri brgyad): dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnan na/ nges par 'byung ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gis phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med cing
267a5(khri brgyad): dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te nang
267a6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi
267a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gis phyir nang stong pa nyid dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
267a8(khri brgyad): rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na//
267b1(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhigan/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo cang /
267b2(khri brgyad): kyi bar du dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar
267b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
267b4(khri brgyad): zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos
267b5(khri brgyad): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
267b6(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni
267b7(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir dngos po med cing /
267b8(khri brgyad): dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te tshad
268a1(khri brgyad): med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen
268a2(khri brgyad): 'dis/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir tshad pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
268a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jin/
268a4(khri brgyad): rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
268a5(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung ba
268a6(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang
268a7(khri brgyad): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/
268a8(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams
268b1(khri brgyad): dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnon nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
268b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i chos rnams dngos po yin te/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir brgyad pa'i chos rnams dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa
268b3(khri brgyad): chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir
268b4(khri brgyad): 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / rab 'byor gal te sangs
268b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin nan/ theg po chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par
268b6(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te rig kyi dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin nAn/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten/
268b7(khri brgyad): zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rigs kyi dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen
268b8(khri brgyad): chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa
269a1(khri brgyad): dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas
269a2(khri brgyad): dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges
269a3(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sangs rgyas dngos po med cing dngos po yod ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
269a4(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par
269a5(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa ma yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang
269a6(khri brgyad): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
269a7(khri brgyad): rten dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung
269a8(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub snying po la thug gi bar du/ bar der byang chub sems dpa' sems skyed pa gang yin pa
269b1(khri brgyad): de dag dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig
269b2(khri brgyad): na/ rab 'byor gang gis phyir sems skyed nas bzung ste/ byang chub snying po la thug gi bar du/ bar der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems skyed pa gang yin
269b3(khri brgyad): pa de dag dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar
269b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
269b5(khri brgyad): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
269b6(khri brgyad): bo'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
269b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dang po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis byang chub sems dpa'
269b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos bag chags dang / 'tshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa
270a1(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thob nas/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/
270a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
270a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos bag chags dang / 'tshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ye shes rnam pa tha
270a4(khri brgyad): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thob ste/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yid du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa
270a5(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yang ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs
270a6(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan nas mdze
270a7(khri brgyad): shing lhang de ldan ne lhang nger mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
270a8(khri brgyad): bcu rtsa gnyis dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid
270b1(khri brgyad): dang dpal gyi lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan te/ mdzes shing lha me lhan ne lhang nger po// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
270b2(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
270b3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
270b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi 'jig rten
270b5(khri brgyad): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par 'gyur to// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs kyi dbyangs yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pa dngos po yin te/ dngos
270b6(khri brgyad): po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyings kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa grang
270b7(khri brgyad): med pa dag tu go bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag drug bcu dang ldan
270b8(khri brgyad): kha'i dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
271a1(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pago bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
271a2(khri brgyad): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze la
271a3(khri brgyad): lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun pa bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi
271a4(khri brgyad): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa yang ma yin pas de'i phyir de bzhi
271a5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par bskor ba
271a6(khri brgyad): mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ gang gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
271a7(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las
271a8(khri brgyad): 'das par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sems can dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir gang dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pas
271b1(khri brgyad): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag phung po lhag pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'ang so// yongasu
271b2(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// / bam po bcwo lnga pa'o// /
271b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa lag so zhes smra ba ni/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor theg pa 'di ni nam
271b4(khri brgyad): mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni shar phyogs mngon pa med do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs 'tsham
271b5(khri brgyad): mngon pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang shar phyogs mngon pa med do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang phyogs 'tshams mngon pa med
271b6(khri brgyad): do// de'i phyir theg pa 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni ring po yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ lham pa ma yin/ zlum po ma yin/
271b7(khri brgyad): mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ lham pa ma yin/ zlum po ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/
271b8(khri brgyad): mi mnyam pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'di yang na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin/ dmar
272a1(khri brgyad): / 'o ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ bcod ka ma yin/ shel dang dung gi kha dog lta bu ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di sngon po ma yin/
272a2(khri brgyad): ser po ma yin/ dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ btsod ka ma yin/ shel drung gi kha dog lta bu ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni namakha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab
272a3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ namakha' ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ong ba
272a4(khri brgyad): ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la ni 'grib pa med/ 'phel ba med bri
272a5(khri brgyad): ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang 'grib pa med/ 'phel ba med/ 'bri ba med/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
272a6(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med rnam par byang ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa med/ rnam par
272a7(khri brgyad): byang ba med de/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'di na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na na mkha' ni skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med do// gnas med/ gnas
272a8(khri brgyad): dang bral ba med/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de yang skye ba med/ 'gag pa med/ gnas pa med gnas dang bral ba med/ gnas
272b1(khri brgyad): las gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni namakha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ namakha' ni dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/
272b2(khri brgyad): lung bstan du yod pa ma yin/ lung bstan du med pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ lung bstan du yod pa ma yin/
272b3(khri brgyad): lung bstan du med pa ma yin/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ namakha' ni mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/
272b4(khri brgyad): dran pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang mthong ba ma yin thos pa ma yin/ dran pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin//
272b5(khri brgyad): de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni shes par bya ba ma yin/ shes par mi bya ba ma yin/ yongasu shes par bya/
272b6(khri brgyad): ba ma yin/ spang bar bya ba ma yin/ mngon gsum du bya ba ma yin/ sgom par bya ba ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang shes par bya ba ma yin/ shes parabya
272b7(khri brgyad): ba ma yin yongasu shes par bya bar ma yin/ spang bar bya ba ma yin/ mngon gsum du bya ba ma yin no// sgom par bya ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni na mkha' dang mnya
272b8(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' ni rnam par smin pa ma yin/ rnam par smin pa'i chos can ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang rnam par
273a1(khri brgyad): / smin pa ma yin/ rnam par smin pa'i chos can ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha'
273a2(khri brgyad): ni 'dod pa'i kham su rtogs pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khamasu togs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khamasu rtogs pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
273a3(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'i khamasu togs pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khamasu gtogs pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
273a4(khri brgyad): na/ nam mkha' ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bral ba ma yin/ gti mug dang bcas pa ma yin/ gti mug dang bral ba ma yin no//
273a5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa ma yin 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin zhe sdang dang bral ba ma yin/
273a6(khri brgyad): gti mug dang bcas pa ma yin/ gti mug dang bral ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de na mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na mkha' la ni sems dang
273a7(khri brgyad): po skyed pa med/ gnyis pa med/ gsum pa med/ bzhi pa med/ lnga pa med/ drug pa med/ bdun pa med/ brgyad pa med/ dgu pa med/ sems bskyed pa bcub med
273a8(khri brgyad): // rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang sems skyed pa dang po med/ gnyis pa med/ gsum pa med/ bzhi pa med/ lnga pa med/ drug pa med/ bdun pa
273a9(khri brgyad): n+ya gzug kyi khamasu nog pa ma yin/
