300b8(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa de gnyi ga med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
301a1(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag ces bgyi ba yang bdag mngon par grub pa ni/ gtan ma mchis lag so zhes sgra zhes zer ba ni// tshe dang ldan
301a2(khri brgyad): pa sha ri'i bu bdag btan med cing dmigs na/ de mngon par grub par gyur pa lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can dang / srog dang / skyes bu dang /
301a3(khri brgyad): gso ba dang / skye bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po gtan med cing mi dmig
301a4(khri brgyad): na de dag mngon par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs bstan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor
301a5(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga yod// tshe dang ldan
301a6(khri brgyad): pa sha ri'i bu mig gtan cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid brtan
301a7(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lta ga yod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing pi dmigs na de mngon pa 'grub
301a8(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams bstan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'gyur ba lhag
301b1(khri brgyad): la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu mig gis rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang /
301b2(khri brgyad): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub pa lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu mig gi 'dus
301b3(khri brgyad): te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te
301b4(khri brgyad): reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu mig gi 'das te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
301b5(khri brgyad): ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
301b6(khri brgyad): ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gtan med
301b7(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
301b8(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub
302a1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos
302a2(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i dran pa nye bar bzhag
302a3(khri brgyad): pa rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
302a4(khri brgyad): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
302a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par
302a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga yod/ rang sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon
302a7(khri brgyad): par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa
302a8(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs
302b1(khri brgyad): des na/ bdag bdag ces bya ba yang dag par ma grub par gtan med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir 'di ltar chos thams
302b2(khri brgyad): cad dngos po mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar na 'dus
302b3(khri brgyad): pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bu smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe/
302b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba ngo bo nyid med do// tshor ba dang / 'dus shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las
302b5(khri brgyad): byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu mig gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// de bzhin du/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi
302b6(khri brgyad): 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes
302b7(khri brgyad): ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus
302b8(khri brgyad): te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dus pa la
303a1(khri brgyad): byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
303a2(khri brgyad): du phyin dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'dus
303a3(khri brgyad): pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnams grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gnas
303a4(khri brgyad): yang chos thams cad ni mig rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang bla rab 'byor chos thams cad ni pi rtag pa ste/ gang dang bra
303a5(khri brgyad): bsam yin pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang pA sha ri'i bu gzugs ni mi stag pa ste/ gang dngape yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
303a6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mi sdug pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
303a7(khri brgyad): ri'i bu 'di ltar mig stag smin+da po de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang /
303a8(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med dang / smon pa med pa ste/ gang dang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa den
303b1(khri brgyad): zad pa'i mngon po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
303b2(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa stong pa gang dang bral bas ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus
303b3(khri brgyad): ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pas ste/ gang dang yang bral
303b4(khri brgyad): bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug ste/ gnas pa ma yin 'jig pa yin no// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
303b5(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzug ni ther zug dugan
303b6(khri brgyad): pa ma yin/ 'jig pas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
303b7(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du dge ba dang /
303b8(khri brgyad): dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma 'tho med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mong
304a1(khri brgyad): pa medade pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus pa byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byung ba'i chos
304a2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam
304a3(khri brgyad): grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang
304a4(khri brgyad): lag/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags zhes zer smras zhes
304a5(khri brgyad): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzug ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par 'dus ma byas so//
304a6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan bu sha ri'i bu mig ni mngon par 'du ma byas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
304a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du na pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'du ba byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir
304a8(khri brgyad): zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni
304b1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad kyi bar du yang mngon par 'du shes
304b2(khri brgyad): dang / rnam pa shes pa napas ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gang mngon par ma grub pa de gzugs ma lags
304b3(khri brgyad): gang mngon par ma grub pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnab par shes pa lags shis zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin te/ de de bzhin
304b4(khri brgyad): no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ rang bzhin stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan du gyur pa med
304b5(khri brgyad): pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ rang bzhin gyi stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med
304b6(khri brgyad): cing 'jig pa med do// gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la gzhan du gyur pa med do// chos thams cad kyi bar du ba rang bzhin stong ste/ gang dag rang bzhin
304b7(khri brgyad): gyi stong pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do// gang dag de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// rnam grangs des na/ gang mngon
304b8(khri brgyad): par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnabs dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
305a1(khri brgyad): pa sha ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir ci mngon par ma grub pa ste/ mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par gyi
305a2(khri brgyad): zhing rjes su bgyi zhing / rjes su brtan par bgyi lags zhes spras zhes zer na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
305a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med
305a4(khri brgyad): dbyer med/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ kho bos 'di skad du ci mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gang gdams par bgyi zhing rjesu
305a5(khri brgyad): bstan par bgyi lags zhes smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa las grub na yang gang / byang chub kyi slad du spong
305a6(khri brgyad): par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigasu pa mchis lag so// zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di lta byang chub sems dpa' sepa dpa' chen po shes
305a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par grub pa yang gzhanal/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes mthong mo/ de ltar na bdod par mgur
305a8(khri brgyad): pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su byar med do// mngon par mgru pa yang las gud na gzugs yang dag par rje su ma mthong / mngon pa ma
305a9(khri brgyad): rmed cing
305b1(khri brgyad): grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs
305b2(khri brgyad): de ni gnyis su med cing gnyi su dbyer med do// de ltar mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni gnyis dbyer
305b3(khri brgyad): med do// de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na/ tshor thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams
305b4(khri brgyad): cad kyi bar de ni gnyi su dbyer med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu grangs des ni/ mngon par grub pa las gud na byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dmig
305b5(khri brgyad): su med pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// / bam po bcu bdun pa//
305b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing //
305b7(khri brgyad): 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngangs dngangs par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
305b8(khri brgyad): pa lags par rig par rig par bgyi zhes spu zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ chos thams cad g.yo ba med
306a1(khri brgyad): par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu/ gzugs rnyan/
306a2(khri brgyad): lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag rjesu mthong te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
306a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa ni snyan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngangs zhing dngangs par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
306a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gang gis tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe
306a5(khri brgyad): gzugs khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyi ste/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dom par mi bgyid lag so// de'i tshe
306a6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa khas len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni
306a7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'doms par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe mig khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par
306a8(khri brgyad): mi bgyid cing / 'di ni mig go zhes 'dom par mi bgyid lagaso// de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len cing
306b1(khri brgyad): mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid cing 'di ni yid do zhes 'dom par mi bgyid lag so// de bzhin du de'i tshe/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len/
306b2(khri brgyad): cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par mi bgyid cing 'di do zhes 'doms par mi bgyid lag so// de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin
306b3(khri brgyad): la gnas par mi bgyid mngon par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o zhes 'doms par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims
306b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
306b5(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o zhes 'doms
306b6(khri brgyad): par mi bgyid lagaso// de'i tshe nang bstong nyid las mi len cing mi la 'dzin la gnas par bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni nang stong pa
306b7(khri brgyad): nyid do zhes 'dom par mi bgyid lag so// de bzhin du de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid/
306b8(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// zhes 'dom par mi bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
307a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi/
307a2(khri brgyad): bgyid de mngon par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam so zhes 'doms par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i de'i tshe yang
307a3(khri brgyad): dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i
307a4(khri brgyad): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad las
307a5(khri brgyad): mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam so// zhes 'doms par mi bgyid
307a6(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams
307a7(khri brgyad): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad las mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang /
307a8(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'doms par mi bgyid lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
307b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs yang dag par rje su mi bzong / de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams yang dag par rje su mi mthong
307b2(khri brgyad): zhing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos
307b3(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjesu mi thong ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
307b4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/ gzugs kyi skye ba mi mchis pa gang lags pa'i slad du'o// da ltar ni gzugs dang skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa/
307b5(khri brgyad): de gnyis mchis gnyisu dbyer ma mchis pa lag so// de gnyisu mchis gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
307b6(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba
307b7(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa lagaso/ mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni ming ma lag so// rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus
307b8(khri brgyad): dang / yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lag pa de ni yid ma lag so// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
308a1(khri brgyad): ma lag so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
308a2(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ltar
308a3(khri brgyad): na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/
308a4(khri brgyad): de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing / gnyisu dbyer ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das
308a5(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang legs pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams pa lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / skye
308a6(khri brgyad): ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis so// gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
308a7(khri brgyad): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lags dang / lam dang mi 'jigs pa dang / stobs rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sang
308a8(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas
308b1(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams dang / skye m+b+ha mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
308b2(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa gang legs pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste/
308b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing /
308b4(khri brgyad): gnyis dbyer mo mchis lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/
308b5(khri brgyad): de'i slad du de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos
308b6(khri brgyad): kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gal lag
308b7(khri brgyad): pa de nyid/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skyeb pa mchis pa de ni gnyis su dbyer
308b8(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
309a1(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa lag so//
309a2(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis
309a3(khri brgyad): pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyi su dbyer ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag ste/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa ga lags pa de ni gzugs
309a4(khri brgyad): ma lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
309a5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis
309a6(khri brgyad): shing gnyisu ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni cig ma lags mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// khams dang skye
309a7(khri brgyad): mched rnams 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis
309a8(khri brgyad): su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das smin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma lag ste/
309b1(khri brgyad): byu nga / da kyis smras pa sa shi gnyis bye pa mchis lag so// bzhin du su la zis kyi pa sa
309b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'grib khrim
309b3(khri brgyad): pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyisu ma mchis shing / gnyi su dbyer ma mchis
309b4(khri brgyad): lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni cig pa lagaso/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de ci'i srad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
309b5(khri brgyad): pa' 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags
309b6(khri brgyad): te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyi su pa mchis shing gnyi su dbyer ma mchis lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa de na
309b7(khri brgyad): cig ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du nang spong ba nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lag so// de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi 'grib
309b8(khri brgyad): ba gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'grib pa de ni gnyis pa mchis ning
310a1(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer meng pa lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni cig ma lags mang po ma lags pa'i slad du
310a2(khri brgyad): de/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar
310a3(khri brgyad): bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa ni gnyis su ma mchis
310a4(khri brgyad): shing / gnyi su dbyer ma mchis lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad ste/ de'i slad du
310a5(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lagaso// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
310a6(khri brgyad): rnam pang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang galags pa de ni
310a7(khri brgyad): lam ma lags te/ de ltar na lam dang 'grib pa de ni gnyi su ma mchis shing / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
310a8(khri brgyad): 'grib pa ni cig ma lags mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lag so// de bzhin du mngon par shes pa
310b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / mi 'jig pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs
310b2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis zhing / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de
310b3(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bco ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni cig pa lags/ ma po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib
310b4(khri brgyad): pa gang lags pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyisu ma mchis pa'i grangasu bgyi
310b5(khri brgyad): pa lagaso// de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni/ gnyi su ma mchis pa'i grangasu bgyis pa lag
310b6(khri brgyad): so// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangasu bgyi ba lagaso// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad
310b7(khri brgyad): pa las/ gnyi su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
310b8(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag ni ji ltar nye bar rtog/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
311a1(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin pas/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang
311a2(khri brgyad): khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/ de'i phyir byang
311a3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyis rnam pa shes te// chos gang dag la mngon par shes pa yang med do// chos gang dag gi rnam
311a4(khri brgyad): par shes pa zhe na gzugs kyi rnam par shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
311a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa shes pa ste/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub
311a6(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de yang mngon par zhen pa med do// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
311a7(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor no thas cad kyirnapa sa
311a8(khri brgyad): bye gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags pa gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa gang dag
311b1(khri brgyad): dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gi 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sam/ gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ ro rnams sa pa/ reg
311b2(khri brgyad): rnams sam/ chos rnams sam/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnamasu 'dzin pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyis rnam pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di
311b3(khri brgyad): skad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song bas te/ de'i
311b4(khri brgyad): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gang la ring du song ba zhes na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched
311b5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug las ring
311b6(khri brgyad): du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
311b7(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa las ring du song ba zhes bya'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar
311b8(khri brgyad): du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam dang / dbang po rnam dang / stobs rnam
312a1(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lags brgyad pa ring du song bas ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhe
312a2(khri brgyad): bya'o// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jig snga rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad po dag la ring du song te/ de'i phyir
312a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ring du song bya zhes bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du
312a4(khri brgyad): song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du
312a5(khri brgyad): nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar nye bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni ga
312a6(khri brgyad): rtags ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar mi rtogs go// gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar mI rtog go/ gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba
312a7(khri brgyad): dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi rtog go/ gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog// gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar
312a8(khri brgyad): nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du tshor dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par
312b1(khri brgyad): shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes
312b2(khri brgyad): bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya bar myi rtog go// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par
312b3(khri brgyad): shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin
312b4(khri brgyad): du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa/ 5/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
312b5(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin bden bya
312b6(khri brgyad): ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan
312b7(khri brgyad): ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan pa med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog/ de bzhin
312b8(khri brgyad): du stong pa nyid nag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi
313a1(khri brgyad): rtog go// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang pi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i
313a2(khri brgyad): bar du nye bar du mi rtog go// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbar te/ yang dag pa'i spong
313a3(khri brgyad): brnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang
313a4(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzung
313a5(khri brgyad): kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar mi rtog/ bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba
313a6(khri brgyad): smod zhes bya
313a7(khri brgyad): dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan pa med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya
313a8(khri brgyad): bya dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos de
313a9(khri brgyad): dag la de ltar nye bar byed// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bco ldan 'das 'di ltar gzug kyi ma skyes pa gang lag pa de ni gzugs pa lag so//
313b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lag so// de bzhin du khamA dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel
313b2(khri brgyad): bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyog kyi chos rnam dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jig pa rnam dang / sau yang dag par rig
313b3(khri brgyad): ba rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba mchis pa
313b4(khri brgyad): gang lags pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lag so// zhes smras/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzug ni gzugs kyi stong // tshe dang ldan
313b5(khri brgyad): pa sha ri'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzug ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugam
313b6(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni gzug ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa sto // tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam
313b7(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa de ni rnam par
313b8(khri brgyad): shes pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin
314a1(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du skye ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /
314a2(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
314a3(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin
314a4(khri brgyad): pa de ni skye ba med pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po
314a5(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/
314a6(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid skye ba med pa/ gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
314a7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi stong ngo // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
314a8(khri brgyad): rnams kyi ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phru gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi san
314b1(khri brgyad): lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi
314b2(khri brgyad): chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni//
314b3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa
314b4(khri brgyad): de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du 'di gzugs 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni
314b5(khri brgyad): gzugs pa lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma lag so// de bzhin du kham
314b6(khri brgyad): dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'bru ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi
314b7(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/
314b8(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags shes zer te/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang /
315a1(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis/
315a2(khri brgyad): su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gso ba dang / skye bu dang / gang zag
315a3(khri brgyad): dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// de bzhin du shin du rnam par
315a4(khri brgyad): dag pa'i slad du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i
315a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong ba lag so// de bzhin du shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol bya
315a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong ba lag so// shin du
315a7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong ba lag so/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis skye
315a8(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa mthong ba lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa the bar bzhag pa rnams kyis skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i phrad
315b1(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / la pa dang stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sau yang
315b2(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma
315b3(khri brgyad): mchis pa mthong ba lag so// shin du rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so skye ba ma mchis pa mthong ba lagaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so skye bo'i chos rnams kyi
315b4(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa mthong ba lagaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir
315b5(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sad
315b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// sangs rgyas kyi chos
315b7(khri brgyad): rnabs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lagaso// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa pa rab 'byor gyi smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/ gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin tshor ba das
315b8(khri brgyad): sa 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni skye ba med pa yin/ skye mched rnams skye ba med pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams skye ba med pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnabs
316a1(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
316a2(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad skye
316a3(khri brgyad): ba med pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med pa yin/ so so skye bo'i chos yang skye ba med pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs/
316a4(khri brgyad): ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams skye ba med pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang //
316a5(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos
316a6(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
316a7(khri brgyad): med pa yin/ khyod ldan pa rgya la ca gyu pa/ yangs cam gyikyis rnams kyi bar dum smye ba pa yin te/
316a8(khri brgyad): nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur rab/ de bzhin du so so skye bos kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thab sa
316b1(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/ 'gro ba rnam pa lnga yang tha dad pa med par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' lnga
316b2(khri brgyad): yang thob zin par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na// ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam/
316b3(khri brgyad): sgom par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong bas na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug sab pa'i phyir lam sgom par bya ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i na tha ma'i cha dang / 'thun pa'i kun
316b4(khri brgyad): tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i lam sgom par bya/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can rnams kyi mched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing / sdug bsngal
316b5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de dag nyam su myong bar byed/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
316b6(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ci'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma
316b7(khri brgyad): skyes pa la thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do// kho bo ni ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par mi 'dod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi
316b8(khri brgyad): 'dod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong bar dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom
317a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba sbyang
317a2(khri brgyad): spyod par mi 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bka' ba'i 'du shes mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar bka' ba'i 'du shes la
317a3(khri brgyad): gnas pas ni/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'on kyang phar 'du shes skyed pa dang / mar 'du shes skyed pa
317a4(khri brgyad): dang / bur 'du shes skyed pa dang / dpag tu 'du shes skyed na/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
317a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems skyed par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba yang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyin dang nang
317a6(khri brgyad): gi chos rnams la yang de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub
317a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad thams cad kyis du dga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
317a8(khri brgyad): bu kho bos ni skye ba med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do// chos
317b1(khri brgyad): ma skyes pas kyang thob par bya bas skyes pa thob par mi 'dod do// shi ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cis skyes pa'i chos kyi thob par skyes pa thob pa 'am 'on te skyes/
317b2(khri brgyad): pa'i chos kyi thob pam ma skyes pa'i chos kyi 'thob// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa thob par yang mi 'dod la/
317b3(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa'i chos kyi thob par skyes pa thob par yang mi 'dod do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci thob pa yang med la/ mngon par rtog pa yang med dam/ rab
317b4(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'thob pa yang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de/ gnyis kyi tshul gyi ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus thob pa dang / mngon
317b5(khri brgyad): par rtogs pa dag ni 'jigs rtogs kyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
317b6(khri brgyad): sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi gdags pa yin/ don dam par ni thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med/ rgyun du zhugs
317b7(khri brgyad): pa'ang med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang med/ phyir mi 'ong ba yang med/ dgra bcom pa yang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ sangs rgyas
317b8(khri brgyad): kyang med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor mthong ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa ci ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa thogs pa med
318a1(khri brgyad): / pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa nyid gcig pa bzhin du skye ba med pa'ang / de ltar yin napa/ rab 'byor gyi smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye ba yang
318a2(khri brgyad): mi skye la skye ba med pa yang mi skye'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa spobs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos pa
318a3(khri brgyad): skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa yang brjod pa spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ chos ma skyes so chos skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa khyod spobs sam/
318a4(khri brgyad): zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do// chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa brjod pa'i spobs pa yang
318a5(khri brgyad): kho bo la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa med pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang
318a6(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos/ de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa thogs bla ste/ 'di
318a7(khri brgyad): ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa yang skye ba med/ spobs pa yang skye ba med/ chos kyang skyes pa med
318a8(khri brgyad): gang dag las brtsam te/ brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa ma yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o//
318b1(khri brgyad): spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o// chos ni skye ba med pa'o// gang dag las brtsam te/ brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs skye ba med
318b2(khri brgyad): ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par byung ba dang /
318b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting 'dzin thams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs
318b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
318b5(khri brgyad): kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ brjod pa skye ba medo// / spobs pa skye ba med do// chos skye ba med do// gang
318b6(khri brgyad): dag las brtsam te/ brjod pas spobs pa'i chos de dag gi skye ba med do// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
318b7(khri brgyad): dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jig pa rnam
318b8(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du skye ba med pa'o// de bzhin du sbar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
319a1(khri brgyad): da skye ba med do// de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi 'gro ba lnga po dag tha dad pa yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyi smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bani
319a2(khri brgyad): no// de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ji ltar thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam pa
319a3(khri brgyad): ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar don dam par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med/ skye ba myed/ 'gag pa yang med// kun nas nyon mongs pa
319a4(khri brgyad): yang med/ rnam par byang ba yang med pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci chos pa skyes pa skye ba'am/ 'on te chos skye ba skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
319a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni chos pa skyes pa yang mi 'dod la chos skyes pa yang skye bar mi 'dod do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos ma skyes pa gang
319a6(khri brgyad): skye bar mi 'dod// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do// kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
319a7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod de/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub
319a8(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
319b1(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa rnams dang / byang chub ma skyes pa thob par mi 'dod do// mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos skye ba gang
319b2(khri brgyad): skye bar mi 'dong / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs skyes pa med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa skye bar mi 'dod/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni tshor ba
319b3(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid skyeb skye bar mi 'dong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skye ba ngo banyid
319b4(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid kyi skye bar mi 'dod do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos skye 'am skye bar chos skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
319b5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu ma skyes pa'ang mi skye la/ skyes pa'ang mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ginya ga
319b6(khri brgyad): yang ldan pa yang ma yI mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
319b7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye bo med pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /
319b8(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo tham
320a1(khri brgyad): cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / de bzhin
320a2(khri brgyad): du sbyar te/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te//
320a3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnams grangs des na/ brjod pa skye ba med/ spobs pa skye ba med/ chos skye ba med/ gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par spobs pa'i
320a4(khri brgyad): chos de dag kyang skye ba med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bzhag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
320a5(khri brgyad): ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongasu dris pa de dang de nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar chos thams
320a6(khri brgyad): cad la mig gnas pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad la mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
320a7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyin yang mi gnas/ gnyis ga med par yang mi gnas so// tshe dang ldan pa sha
320a8(khri brgyad): ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong te/ de ni nang yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ga
320b1(khri brgyad): me par yang mi dmigs/ rje dang ldan pa sha ri bu mig ni rang bzhin gyi stong paste/ de nI nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ga yang mi
320b2(khri brgyad): dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi
320b3(khri brgyad): gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas de ni phyi nA yang mi gnas/ gnyis
320b4(khri brgyad): med pa yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ de'i nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol
320b5(khri brgyad): na yang mi gnas ste/ gnyis ga med pa na yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ de'i nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol
320b6(khri brgyad): na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med pa na yang mi dpag so/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
320b7(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de'i nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi ro/
320b8(khri brgyad): na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med bA na yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang
321a1(khri brgyad): mi banas/ gnyis ka bang par yang mi dadags/ dang ldan pa gari'i bu sa pabed pa ju dbyung kyi na/ 'on rang da kya
321a2(khri brgyad): doni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag rnams ni rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ de ni nang na yang
321a3(khri brgyad): mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmig so// de bzhin yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stob
321a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lags rnams dang / lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang na mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
321a5(khri brgyad): dmig so// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni rang bzhin gyi stong
321a6(khri brgyad): ste/ de dag ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ga med pa yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni
321a7(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyis ga med par yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam grangs des na chos tham
321a8(khri brgyad): cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pas gzug
321b1(khri brgyad): yongs su snang bar bya'o// tshor ba dag/ 'dunas dang / 'du byed rnapas dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu sgyur bar bya'o// khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
321b2(khri brgyad): bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa dang / sa dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
321b3(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
321b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar du yongasu spang bar bya'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ji ltar
321b5(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi lam yongasu srung bar bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod do//
321b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
321b7(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni
321b8(khri brgyad): gang yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan sha ri'i bu 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po dag/
322a1(khri brgyad): sbyin bdag du gyur cing / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / 'dron po dang / slong mo bzas 'dod pa rnams la zas/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnam
322a2(khri brgyad): la gnon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnabs la ni 'phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams
322a3(khri brgyad): la byug pa/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/ skan tshogs chas 'dod pa rnams la ni tshogs chas/ sman 'dod pa rnams la ni sngan/ mi'i lo
322a4(khri brgyad): byang gang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed cing / bu 'dod pa rnams la ni bu sbyin par byed/ bu mo 'dod pa rnams la ni bu mo sbyin par byed/ rlung ma 'dod pa rnams la ni chung ma sbyin par
322a5(khri brgyad): byed/ rgyal srid 'dod pa rnams la ni rgyal srid sbyin par byed/ mgo bo 'dod pa rnams la ni mgo bo sbyin par byed/ mig 'dod pa rnams la ni mig smin par byed/ yan lag 'dod pa rnams la
322a6(khri brgyad): ni yan lag sbyin par byed/ sha khrag dang rkang 'dod pa rnams la ni sha khrag dang rkang sbyin par byed/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni smin par byed pa'o// 'di ni len pa'o// bdag ni ser sna med pa'o//
322a7(khri brgyad): bdag ni sbyin pa bdag go// bdag ni gdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed pa'o// bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'o snyam du
322a8(khri brgyad): sems shing / sbyin pa de ni 'byin nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sems can thams cad mthun mongs du byas shing / bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe la yang bde
322b1(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur zhing / len pa med par yongs phye ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur cig ces/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo bar byed do// de ni chags pag tu
322b2(khri brgyad): la chags shing sbyin pa 'byin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i 'du shes te/ chags pa gsum po de dag
322b3(khri brgyad): la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten las
322b4(khri brgyad): mi g.yo mi 'phags cing mi 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i smin pa'i pha rol tu p+la zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
322b5(khri brgyad): 'khor gsum yong su dag pa'o// de la 'khor gsum yong su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smin pa sbyin pa na bdag
322b6(khri brgyad): tu mi dmigs/ len par mi dmigs/ sbyin par mi dmigs shing de de'i rnam par smin pa la mngon par dga' ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' se
322b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin na/ sbyin pa de sems can thams
322b8(khri brgyad): cad la stobs par byed kyang / sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs/ bdag kyang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs la/ smin pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
323a1(khri brgyad): byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed cing / byang chub kyang mi dmigs pa de ni tshe dang ldan pa sa ri'i 'jig cen las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes rgya
323a2(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir 'jig rten pas 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags pa 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten
323a3(khri brgyad): las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
323a4(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// / bam po bcwo brgyad pa//
323a5(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'jig rten yang de bzhin yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod de/ de la 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin/
323a6(khri brgyad): pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag gis ser sna'i sems tshar bcad do// zhes dmigs pa la gnas nas/ sbyin pa
323a7(khri brgyad): sbyin par byed de/ de yang bdag dang sems can dang / sbyin pa'i 'du shes la gnas shing / de gdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ste/ dmigs pa la gnas nas/ phyi dang nang gi
323a8(khri brgyad): dngos po'am/ zin pa dang ma zin pa'am/ ci 'dod pa thams cad yong su gtong ba dang / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas shing / lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi dmigs pas
323b1(khri brgyad): gnas shing / sems can du lta ba dang / dge bar lta ba na gnas shing / tshul khrims dang / dge bcu'i las kyi lam de dag la rten nas/ tshul khrims dag sems can thams cad dang
323b2(khri brgyad): 'thun mongs du byas shing / byang chub dmigs nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / de bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa/ bdag dang sems can dang / bzod pa la gan
323b3(khri brgyad): shing / sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa bzod par byas la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang mthun mongs du byas nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na
323b4(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba dang / de lus dmig shing / bsod nams kyi tshogs dmigs la/ ye shes kyi tshogs dmigs shing / bdag
323b5(khri brgyad): dmigs shing / byang chub dmigs shing / brtson 'grus brtsom te/ de brtson 'grus brtsom pa de rlom sems su byed pa dang / de byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang /
323b6(khri brgyad): btang snyoms bsgoms par byed cing / bsam gtan rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yang snyoms par
323b7(khri brgyad): 'jug par pa la yang sdang bar yang byed cing de dag gi ro myang bar byed pa de dag gi rlom sems su yang byed cing / dmigs pa'i lta ba can du gyur nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
323b8(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas shing / byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'o// de gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
324a1(khri brgyad): / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs shing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du dmigs nas stong pa nyid slob sa/
324a2(khri brgyad): de dmigs pa la spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas de yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
324a3(khri brgyad): tu yongasu bsngo ba dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sdig pa thams cad so sor chags pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyis bsod nams thams cad la rjesu yid rang ba dang / bdag dang gzhan
324a4(khri brgyad): gyi don gyi phyir dmigs nas/ thabs ma yin pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / phung po gsum pa'i bsod nams thabs ma yin pas/ sems can tham
324a5(khri brgyad): cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das
324a6(khri brgyad): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang zhes na/ bdag dang sems can dang sbyin par bya ba mi dmigs pa'i shes rab 'khor gsum yong su dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol
324a7(khri brgyad): du phyin pa yongasu spyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / tshu'i khrims dang byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongasu dag pas byang chub kyi phyir/ tshul khrims yod
324a8(khri brgyad): su spong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang bzod pa dang byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongasu dag pas byang chub kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongasu sbyong bar byed pa dang /
324b1(khri brgyad): bdag dang lus dang sems dang brtsod 'grus dang / bsod na pas dang ye shes mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongasu dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa
324b2(khri brgyad): yongasu sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang sems can dang / bsam gtan dang / ti nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs te/ byang chub kyi phyir bsam gtan
324b3(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad dmigs pas byang chub kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu sbyong bar byed pa dang /
324b4(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyang yongasu bsngo ba dag med pa dag/ yongasu sngo ba bla na med pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba bsam
324b5(khri brgyad): gyi mi khyab pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba chud pa med pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba dpag tu med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed pa ste/ de
324b6(khri brgyad): ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya// ci'i phyir ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la
324b7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa zhes bya na/ de la 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag gi 'jig rten du gyur pa dang / gang dag gi 'jig rten 'grub par 'gyur byed pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten dang mnyam
324b8(khri brgyad): pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten gyi phyir sbyin pa dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten las byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gi 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten du 'byung
324b9(khri brgyad): 'ar gsuM dag nga
325a1(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis 'jig rten las sprul pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten ste
325a2(khri brgyad): bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten sel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gang dag gis sgrol bar byed pa dang / gang dag gi 'jig rten ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten
325a3(khri brgyad): las 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten las sgrol ba dang / de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
325a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la skrod pa ni/ de ltar byang chub kyi lam yongasu spong bar byed do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
325a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
325a6(khri brgyad): po'i byang chub kyi lam yin// yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'pha
325a7(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
325a8(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
325b1(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub
325b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi skyes bu'i brtsal yin/ rab
325b3(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi
325b4(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa ni/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge
325b5(khri brgyad): ba'i chos thams cad skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyan thos kyi chos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
325b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasasu 'dzin par byed pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
325b7(khri brgyad): bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
325b8(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
326a1(khri brgyad): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brlabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar 'gyuraro// tshe dang ldan pa
326a2(khri brgyad): sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang
326a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du
326a4(khri brgyad): pa 'di bshad pa na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur du med cing / rmongs pa med par gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta
326a5(khri brgyad): ste/ snying rjes sems can thams cad skyabs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mi btang ba'i phyir/ 'di ltar gnas pa 'dis gnas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ de yang
326a6(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa'i tshul gyi gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bus smras
326a7(khri brgyad): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang mi bral bar gnas pa des gnas de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges
326a8(khri brgyad): yin par 'dod na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar na sems can thams cad kyang byang chub yin par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar sems
326b1(khri brgyad): can thams cad ni yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu legaso leg so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus yang dag pa'i tshig brjod
326b2(khri brgyad): pas/ don de nyid yongasasu bzungs pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dmig su 'phe bso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa
326b3(khri brgyad): med par rig par bya zhing / sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa med par rig par
326b4(khri brgyad): bya ba'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig
326b5(khri brgyad): par bya'o// gzugs dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya/ gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya//
326b6(khri brgyad): gzugs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
326b7(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid
