355b1(khri brgyad): pa yongasu bzung ba dang / med par bya ba'i phyir mi srog/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongasasu bzungs pa dang / med par bya ba'i phyir mi
355b2(khri brgyad): slob po// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs la yongasu bzung ba podo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzu
355b3(khri brgyad): la gzugs yongasu mi 'dzin pa'i phyiraro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri 'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yongasu bzung ba medado// de ci'i
355b4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin pa'i phyiraro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
355b5(khri brgyad): yongasu bzung ba med do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa
355b6(khri brgyad): sha ri'i bu chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba med pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
355b7(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges pa
355b8(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur rab/ rab 'byor gyi smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po chos thams cad yongasu bzung ba
356a1(khri brgyad): / med pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/
356a2(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar bslob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na chos thams cad yongasu bzung bar bya ba ma yin zhing / med par bya ba
356a3(khri brgyad): phyir ma yin par bslab pas ni rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
356a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / blang ba dang / dor ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang /
356a5(khri brgyad): 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni gzug kyi ngo bo nyid kyis med pa'i phyiraro// tshe dang ldan
356a6(khri brgyad): pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / blang
356a7(khri brgyad): ba dang / dor ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dag par rjes mi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ 'di
356a8(khri brgyad): ltar rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnam dang / skye mched rnam dang / brtse/
356b1(khri brgyad): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyog kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa/
356b2(khri brgyad): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / blang ba dang / dor/
356b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad
356b4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ de ltar chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / blang
356b5(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med par slob pa'i byang chub sems
356b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni slob pa med pa dang / nges par 'byung ba med pa'i tshul gyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
356b7(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i dul 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang nas
356b8(khri brgyad): btsal bar bya/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ rab 'byor gyis le lu las btsal bar bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po 'i rgya byin gyis rjong
357a1(khri brgyad): de/ ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa sha ri'i bu ni 'di skad du/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi
357a2(khri brgyad): pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis le'u las btsal bar bya'o zhes zer na/ ci de 'phags pa khyod kyi byin brlabs yin nam/ de khyod kyi 'bru yin nam rab 'byor gyis
357a3(khri brgyad): spras pa ko'u shi ka de ni kho bo'i mthu ma yino// de ni bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs yino// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'phag 'on de su'i mthu yin/
357a4(khri brgyad): de su'i byin rlabs yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs yino// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
357a5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni byin gyi brlabs med pa yino// de ci'i phyiraskad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yino// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs yin//
357a6(khri brgyad): zhes smra rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin to/ byin gyi brlabs med pa'i chos nyid la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med/ byin gyi rlab
357a7(khri brgyad): pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang byin gyi brlabs med pa'i chos nyid dmigasu med/ de bzhin
357a8(khri brgyad): gshegs pa las gud na yang byin gyi brlabs pa med pa'i chos nyid dmig su me// de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmig su med la/ de bzhin gshegs
357b1(khri brgyad): pa la yang de bzhin nyid dmigasu pa do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmig su medo//
357b2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dmig su med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang gzugs kyi chos nyid dmig su me do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
357b3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigasu medado//
357b4(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid la yang de gshegs pa dmigasu med la/ de bzhini gshegs pa la yang rnam par shes pa'i chos kyi dbyingasu medado// de bzhin du khams rnams dang //
357b5(khri brgyad): skye mched rnams dang / brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / rnam par
357b6(khri brgyad): thar pa'i sgo rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnam dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam dang / rnam pa thams cad
357b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de bzhin gshegs pa dmig su med la de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dmig su med do// rnam pa
357b8(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med la/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi chos nyid
358a1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang yin la/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rna
358a2(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid ldan pa ma yin/ mi ldan pa yin no// gzugs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'a byed
358a3(khri brgyad): sa dang/ mtsha/ 'du shes pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa
358a4(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
358a5(khri brgyad): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ rmo ba dang
358a6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan
358a7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa yong sa yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan
358a8(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zlar gyi chos nyid
358b1(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de
358b2(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid dang ldan dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin//
358b3(khri brgyad): mi ldan pa yang ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar chos tham
358b4(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yino// byin gyis brlabs med pa'i tshul gyis de ni de'i mthu yino// de ni de'i phyir byin gyi brlabs pa yin//
358b5(khri brgyad): ko'u shi ka gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa grang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shi ka gzugs
358b6(khri brgyad): las kyang btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shri ka gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o// gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du
358b7(khri brgyad): shes dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o// rnam par shes pa las kyang gzhan du btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar shes
358b8(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa yang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa'i chos dang/
359a1(khri brgyad): thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa rten du med pa thogs pa med ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa thogs pa med
359a2(khri brgyad): ba ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid cig pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni lem
359a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / brten 'brel bar 'byung ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// pha rol
359a4(khri brgyad): du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
359a5(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o// rnam pa thams
359a6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid las kyang gzhan du btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
359a7(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa thogs
359a8(khri brgyad): ba ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
359b1(khri brgyad): ma yin la gzugs las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang shes
359b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
359b3(khri brgyad): bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud ni yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med/ de bzhin du gzugs kyi de
359b4(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa le ma yin la/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa cher med/ tshor ba dang /
359b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin la// rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid las
359b6(khri brgyad): gud na yang shes rab kyi phyin pa med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa de bzhin
359b7(khri brgyad): nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam pa thams cad
359b8(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ma yin la/
360a1(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par she sa de ba'i sa
360a2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin la/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'di
360a3(khri brgyad): lte ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni che'o// byang chub sems dpa' sem
360a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni che'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
360a5(khri brgyad): / pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu
360a6(khri brgyad): med do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di ni thA' yas pa ste// de la brlabs nas rgyun du zhugs pa
360a7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po mthong bar 'gyuraro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang // dgra bcom pa
360a8(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob po// thob
360b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi kyang / rang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs pa
360b2(khri brgyad): 'chang rgya bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi kyang sems can rnams yongasu smin par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi nga zhing yongasu
360b3(khri brgyad): dag par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i
360b4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthara' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka tshor ba dang /
360b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang
360b6(khri brgyad): che ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs so// /
360b7(khri brgyad): ko'u shi ka de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du
360b8(khri brgyad): pa yang / che ba yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmig / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmig/ dbus pi dmig pa'i phyir te/
361a1(khri brgyad): @/ ko 'u ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ pha rol du phyin pa
361a2(khri brgyad): 'di ni che ba yin no// ko'u shi ka gzugs tshad byed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang tshad med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
361a3(khri brgyad): ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha'i tshad ni dmigasu med do// de bzhin du gzugs kyi
361a4(khri brgyad): tshad kyang dmig su med do// na mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs med do// gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
361a5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin 'di yang med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
361a6(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang tshad med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad med pa'i
361a7(khri brgyad): phyir ro// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i tshad ni dmig su med do// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmis su medo//
361a8(khri brgyad): na mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
361b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yin te/ ke'u shi ka rnams grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
361b2(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa yin no// ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
361b3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper
361b4(khri brgyad): na na mkha' ni dpag tu med pa'o// de bzhin du gzugs kyang dpag tu med do// na mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir gzugs dpag tu med do// gzugs dpag tu med
361b5(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med do// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
361b6(khri brgyad): du dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' snyems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med pa yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u
361b7(khri brgyad): shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni dpag tu med phyir ro// ko'u shi ka 'di ltar ste dper na/ na mkha' ni dpag tu med do// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad
361b8(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dpag tu med do// na mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag
362a1(khri brgyad): tu med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med pa yin// go'u shi ka rnam grangasas
362a2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang dpag tu med pa yino// ko'u shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
362a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmi
362a4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
362a5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rnam pa mtha'i dang dbus mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs
362a6(khri brgyad): des na/ gzugs mtha' yas pa'i dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis pa
362a7(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
362a8(khri brgyad): rol du phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yino// // lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas
362b1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyid pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka rna ba pa tha
362b2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyiro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yino// ko'u shi ka gzhan
362b3(khri brgyad): yang chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yi no// lha'i dbang
362b4(khri brgyad): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha'
362b5(khri brgyad): yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin
362b6(khri brgyad): pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
362b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin no// lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
362b8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar de bzhin
363a1(khri brgyad): nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir dmigs pa mtha' yas pa yin no// dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa yin te/ ko'u
363a2(khri brgyad): shi ka de bzhin nyid kyi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/ 'di yang
363a3(khri brgyad): mtha' yas pa yin no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
363a4(khri brgyad): yang mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yino// lha'i dbang po smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
363a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyis pha rol du phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can zhes bya ba de ni chos
363a6(khri brgyad): gang gi tshig bla dgas yin snyam/ lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin//
363a7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste sems can zhes bya ba ni blo bur du ming du btags pa'o// de ni dngos po med par ming du btags pa'o// de ni dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o// /
363a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la 'ga' yang sems can yongasu brjod pa yod snyam 'am/ lha'i
363b1(khri brgyad): dbang pos smras pas/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang la 'ga' yang sems can brjod pa med de la sems can mtha'
363b2(khri brgyad): ba ci zhig yod/ ko'u shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du zhugs te/
363b3(khri brgyad): can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/ ko'u shi ka 'di snyams du sems/ de la sems can 'ga' yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod snyam 'ab/ lha'i dbang pos spras
363b4(khri brgyad): ba/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des
363b5(khri brgyad): na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad
363b6(khri brgyad): stong pa las// / mtha' yas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnam
363b7(khri brgyad): dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye ba dang bud med rnams dang drang srong gi tshogs rnams la 'di lta ste/
363b8(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i bathu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlab kyis/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi gang bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / bsten pa dang / ya
364a1(khri brgyad): dag par rab tu babastan par chos 'di ni/ a la la legs par bshad do// a la la chos 'di ni legs par bshad de/
364a2(khri brgyad): a la la chos kyi chos nyid ni legs par bshad pa'o// zhes mched du brjod pa lan gsum mched du brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
364a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di dang / mi 'bral ba de dag ni bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o//
364a4(khri brgyad): gzugs sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos gang
364a5(khri brgyad): yang dmigasu ma mchis kyang / theg pa gsum po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po dag rnam par 'god par mdzad do// zhes kyang
364a6(khri brgyad): gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhi no// gzug saM/
364a7(khri brgyad): tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos gang yang dmig su med cing mi 'byung / theg pa gsu
364a8(khri brgyad): po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa gsum po dag rnam par dgod par yang mdzad do// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
364b1(khri brgyad): chen po gang dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / mi 'bral ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bzung bar bya ba yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
364b2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/ theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po dag kyang rgya cher
364b3(khri brgyad): bstan cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las gud na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
364b4(khri brgyad): du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las gud na yang // de bzhin gshegs
364b5(khri brgyad): pa dmigasu med/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis bar las gud na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dmigasu med/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
364b6(khri brgyad): pa rnams la gud na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dmig su med/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnam dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
364b7(khri brgyad): rnam dang / lab rnams gud na yang / de bzhin gsheg pa dmig su med/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs byin dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
364b8(khri brgyad): byitshom pa 'dres pa rnams las gung na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dmig su med/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa zhing bar la su na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dmin su mas
365a1(khri brgyad): lha'i bu de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos de dag la slob cing / rnam pa
365a2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid par dag las yang slob par byed pa'i phyir te lha'i bu dag de lta bso na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol
365a3(khri brgyad): du phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod pa yin no// lha'i bu dag gang gis tshe// bde bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
365a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar mo mdzad kyi thad ni/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor pad pa can zhes bya ba'i tshong 'dus kyis dbus na 'dug cing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin
365a5(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
365a6(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar dang bral bar ma gyur/
365a7(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
365a8(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag rnams dang bral bar ma gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / ting 'dzin thams cad dang
365b1(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres
365b2(khri brgyad): pabargyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang yang bral bar ma 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs
365b3(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par me mdzad des/ nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa'i 'og tu
365b4(khri brgyad): bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rig pa
365b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
365b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btso
365b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ci tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di/ gzugs yongasu mi 'dzin mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
365b8(khri brgyad): ba yongasu mi 'dzin mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yong su mi 'dzin mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
366a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thun par yongasu 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po
366a2(khri brgyad): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i rig
366a3(khri brgyad): kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams dang / de 'dug par thug su chud nas/ de dag thams cad dbang por bzhag te lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
366a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma dang / rigs kyi
366a5(khri brgyad): bu dang / lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / sgom pa dang /
366a6(khri brgyad): gzhon dag la yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid de la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag
366a7(khri brgyad): ni/ bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi ldan pas kyi glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi gzugs stong
366a8(khri brgyad): pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas par 'gyur zhing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid du legs par gan su byas par 'gyur
366b1(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyi glags mi rnyed cing / mtshan ma med pa la yang mtshan ma med pas glags mi rnyed la/
366b2(khri brgyad): smon pa med pa la yang smon pa med pas glags mi rnyed pa'i phyiraro// de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi mo de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
366b3(khri brgyad): bar du stong pa nyid du legs par gnas su byas pa'i phyir// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi glags mi rnyed cing / mtshan ma med pa la
366b4(khri brgyad): yang mtshan ma med pas glags mi rnyed la/ smon med pa la yang smon pa med pas glags ma rnyed pa'i phyiraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gi glag
366b5(khri brgyad): rnyed par ma 'gyur ba dang / gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang la glegs rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyiraro// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/
366b6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu bo de dag la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang glags par mi 'gyur ro// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
366b7(khri brgyad): gis sems can thams cad la/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / gtang snyoms shin tu sgom shing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sgom
366b8(khri brgyad): ba'i byer po// zu mig bu 'ab/ seMs kyi du ma zhis kyi pe mo tso phyo gas/ 'dis sa kyisalag
367a1(khri brgyad): kyi bu po de dag gis pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pas/ sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i longasu spyad pa dag gis/ bsnyen bkur bar byas
367a2(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chenam po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su btogs pa'i rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha'i bu rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i
367a3(khri brgyad): bu rnams dang / mtha' bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / n+ya gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge rgyas
367a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi
367a5(khri brgyad): pha rol du phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang / mazung ba dang / ma bcang ba dang / kun chub par ma byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis shes rab
367a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya/ bzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/
367a7(khri brgyad): kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
367a8(khri brgyad): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar mi 'gyur na/ ko'u shi
367a9(khri brgyad): rkya 'phrul dga' dang /
367b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung / bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung / lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'jigs pa 'am/ bag
367b2(khri brgyad): tsha bar 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 'amo de dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shin tu sgoms
367b3(khri brgyad): shing pi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang shin tu sgom la/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang shin tu sgom pa'i
367b4(khri brgyad): phyiraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab dral
367b5(khri brgyad): dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyis bar gyis lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
367b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
367b7(khri brgyad): klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de dag rgyun mi chad par bsu
367b8(khri brgyad): ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad
368a1(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams dang / lha dbul po rnams dang / mi dbul po rnams dang / yams kyi bro nad rnams
368a2(khri brgyad): dang / bro nad rnams dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba rnams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam
368a3(khri brgyad): kyang 'jig rten du 'byung du 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i stobs par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /
368a4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
368a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
368a6(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po rnams dang / byang chub sems kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya
368a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / de bzhin gsheg pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
368a8(khri brgyad): dang / 'jig rten na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bco ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnams kyang 'jig
368b1(khri brgyad): rten na mchis lag so// bram ze'i rig shing sa la chen po lta bu rnam kyang 'jig rten na mchis lag so// khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po rnams kyang / 'jig rten na mchis lag so//
368b2(khri brgyad): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rigs dag 'jig rten na mchis lag so// 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu dag 'jig rten na mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang / byang chub sem
368b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten na mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / lhan cig phyir 'ong
368b4(khri brgyad): ba 'jig rten na mchis lagaso// phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten na mchis lagaso// phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten na mchi so// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa 'jig ni rten na
368b5(khri brgyad): mchis lag so// rang byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na mchis lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten na/ sems can yongasu smin par
368b6(khri brgyad): bgyis pa 'jig rten na mchis lag so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa 'jig rten na mchi so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
368b7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten na bzhugs lag so// chos kyi 'khor lo 'jig rten na mchis lag so// sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'jig rten na mchis lag so// chos dkon mAchis lag so// dge
368b8(khri brgyad): 'dun dkon mchog 'jig rten na mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
369a1(khri brgyad): n+ya/ pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi lags so// de skad ces
369a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te// byang chub sem
369a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rgyun chad par 'gyuraro// de
369a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bar 'jig rten na yod pa yin no// ko'u shi ka de bas na/
369a5(khri brgyad): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rgyun mi chad par bkur sti bya
369a6(khri brgyad): bla mar bya/ rjed par bya/ mchod par bya shing / bskyabs pa dang / sba bar bya'o// ko'u shi ka gang dag byang chub
369a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sti stang bya ba dang / zam bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / mchod
369a8(khri brgyad): par bya bar sems pa de dag ni/ ku ra la sti stang bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems pa yin te/
369b1(khri brgyad): ko'u shi ka de lta bas na/ lha dang mi dang / lha yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sti stang bya/
369b2(khri brgyad): bla mar bya/ mchod par bya zhing bsrung ba dang / skyab pa dang sba bar bya'o// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
369b3(khri brgyad): sha stag gi 'di lta ste dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal 'am/ stug ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngag/ til gyi zhing ltar yongasu gang bar gyur
369b4(khri brgyad): na/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ji srid tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyi sto stang byas/ bla mar byas/ brjod par byas/ mchod par byas pas/ gang
369b5(khri brgyad): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ma bral ba cig la sti sdang byas/ bla mar byas/ brjed par byas/ mchod par byas pa de nyid
369b6(khri brgyad): snga ma nas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la rten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam dang /
369b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na yod pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
369b8(khri brgyad): rgyas rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ 'jig rten na yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka de lta bas na/ lha dang / mi dang /
370a1(khri brgyad): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/ byang chub sems
370a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par/ sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/
370a3(khri brgyad): brjed par byas/ mchod par bya zhing bsrung ba dang / skyabs pa dang / sba bar bya/
370a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lung bstan pa zhes
370a5(khri brgyad): bya ba/ brgya byin gyis le'u ste gnyis pa/ le'u nyi shu lnga pa'o// /
370a6(khri brgyad): bkra shis par 'gyur cig/ oM su pra tis tha badz+ra ye swA hA/ dge'o//
